title: Johnny's Memorial @ The Temple
description:
8pm Monday August 31st at The Temple:
Please join Suzanne (wife of Dr.John Lynch,ND) & friends to honor his life & what would have been their 6th Burning Man Wedding Anniversary. Johnny 1/05/09 transitioned (passed away)on our Guru's birthday (Parmahansa Yogananda).  We will chant to Radha & Krishna next to his memorial for Johnny, his wife & for all that have passed away since the last burn. Hug & hold Suzanne (Johnny's wife) & chant aum. Suzanne plans to spend the night at The Temple in honor of their anniversary. Company to keep her warm & safe would be appreciated. "Johnny was the most wonderful husband in all of the Universes."- Quote from Suzanne his unbiased wife. Dr.Lynch took his last breath in his meditation chair after they had cuddled & made out on their bed, with one of their cats cuddling with them. Seated in his chair, Suzanne placed her left hand on his heart & held his left hand in her right & repeated 3x's, "Baby I love you so much! baby I love you so much! Divine Mother loves you! Guruji loves you!" Her husband slipped through the cracks of our health care system...or he would be here today. Check the website to read more about him & their beautiful love story.
other_location: The Temple (memorial for loved ones who have passed)

title: "Common Tongues" - Sex, Risk and Gay Men
description:
"Common Tongues" explores current perspectives regarding sexual behavior, perceived risk factors and communication in our polyamorous, highly sexualized culture.  How do we negotiate what we do—and want to do—with our partners?  What factors come into play when making decisions regarding "safety"?  What unspoken agreements do we hold with ourselves and our partners?  Are those agreements ever broken...and if so, why?  

Due to the highly intimate nature of this topic, I'm requesting that only men who have sex with men participate.  I understand that gender exclusion is controversial, but it's my goal to create a safe, healing space where men can bond on their common physical and sexual experiences and feel free to relate experiences and questions in a common psychic arena.

This is not a lecture or therapy group but an open discussion for people to share their experiences, viewpoints, and feelings in a safe, non-judgmental/non-shaming space.

Vapor (the facilitator) is a San Francisco filmmaker with an educational background in psychology and communications.
print_description: Group discussion exploring communication, "safety" and sexual negotiation between partners.  We'll also explore our relationship to risk and choices.

title: DeBoschery in the Garden of DeLights
description: In the early 16th century Hieronymus Bosch created the masterpiece, “The Garden of Earthly Delights” which depicts the human experience from creation to Christian damnation.  We’re not delving into the fundamental Christian underscore of the piece; we’re in it for the pun.  Our camp is a garden of plant life that is illuminated from within; a “Garden of DeLights”.  Come share a cocktail and dance to the DJs spinning from our potting shed.  Our garden has illuminated croquet and several unique environments to explore.  BYODebauchery.

title: French Maid Brigade Parade
description: French society is zhe most evolved culture in zee world. And zhe most evolved part of zhis culture is zhe French Maid. It is what makes French society what it is: dust free. Zhat is why Le Consulat Général de France à Black Rock City have sponsored zhe French Maid Brigade Parade: to liberate zhe good citizens of Black Rock from zhe oppression of dust and advance zhe evolution of Burning Man. If you have a uniform, you are invited to join us! Please bring: non-feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, any other useful cleaning equipment, and your worst possible French accent. We meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward zhat dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!
print_description: Zhe most evolved part of zhe French culture is zhe French Maid. Join us in uniform with your non-feather duster and your worst possible French accent.

description: Our roles as men and women have dramatically shifted in the last 30 years - and even more so in this shifting economy. title: Stilters High Chair Happy Hour!!
description:
STILTERS & co...
Come TALL and small to the High Chair Bar Stiltz for Happy Hour 5~8pm daily!!
Our daily themes & happy, high demeanor will surely deelite!
Be certain that we aim to please...and you should aim too please, to be there to enjoy our revelry.
We will be serving cocktails to all every weekday between 5 & 8pm.
MONDAY we honor ourselves by getting high and dressing FORMAL.
TUESDAY we put a hitch in our giddy up and don out Western Wear~cowboys and their steeds.
WEDNESDAY is all WHITE in honor of the next day white dawn party. Dress at 4pm and stay ready Playa plied till 4am thursday for the parade to the Temple.
THURSDAY we take flight as Super Heroes...break out the capes and panties.
FRIDAY we get up and get down for Michael Jackson in full on ZOMBIE gear. Thriller will be taught and danced.
Please come dressed how ever you like...we'll be there waitin to cocktail you either way!
Unless the weather is blowin' like snot...in which case...come the next day!!
Get yer STILTS and come on get HIGH!!!
:O}
print_description:
STILTERS!!
Monday: Formal Wear
Tuesday: Western Wear
Wednesday: White Out  
Thursday: Super Heroes
Friday: Zombies
Drinks/Snacks served daily

title: Sweat Your Prayers White Party
description: A Sweat Your Prayers/5Rhythms dance experience. The 5Rhythms is a simple, powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability - can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and mind that is still curious!Wear white and bring out your inner glow on the bamboo dance floor.

title: THE BUS STOP: CHILI
description: Once again, join us at the Pepperland Bus Stop near 8:05ish on Hominid (west or mountain side facing the man) Tuesday for a Chili feed at 2:00 PM. By now, you're just starting to feel dusty, crusty and playafied.  You also might be starting to get tired of all the dried peanuts and raisins you been munching on for the last day or two.  Not to worry, some good food is waiting for you. Prepared for carnivores and herbivores alike, stop by and enjoy a bowl of this years "Extinction Chili".  Consider this an evolutionary experience designed with a good time in mind for all.  Remember, this is a "First Come: First Served" event.  As usual, we expect this years two pots of Chili not to last forever. Hope to meet new friends and see old returnees at "The Bus Stop".  Remember:  "You're either on the bus or off the bus".
print_description: Join us near 8:05ish on Hominid (west or mountain side facing the man) Tuesday for Chili at 2:00 PM.  First Come: First Served. An event to enjoy.

title: 1 Giant Leap: "What About Me?"
description:
"What About Me?" is the second film/music project by Jamie Catto and Duncan Bridgeman under the name, 1 Giant Leap. The film features Will Young; Maxi Jazz; Alanis Morrisette; Tim Robbins; Stuart Copeland; Haale; Stephen Fry; Eckhart Toller; Bob Geldof; Michael Stipe; Eddie Reader; Jaelissa; Arrested Development; Zap Mama; Lila Downs; Michael Franti; Spearhead; Boots Riley; Baaba Maal. 

Q&A with Jamie Catto after the screening.
print_description: Film Screening: 2nd installment from the ground-breaking film/music duo Jamie Catto & Duncan Bridgeman. Q&A with Jamie Catto after the screening.

description: WE'RE BA-AACK! For the second year of sick debauchery! Last year was so successful we had to do it again. Bring your best Buffalo Bill tuck-back and groove to “Good Bye Horses” while the judging panel sip a nice chianti! Will you get the fucking lotion in the basket or will you get the hose? Props  and costumes are encouraged. Prizes for the best recreation! If you have to ask, go rent the movie...

title: 2nd Annual Yacht Rock Happy Hour
description:
Enjoy happy hour in your best Caddyshack, Love Boat, Fantasy Island,
yacht-inspired costume while you enjoy boat drinks and the musical stylings of
Christopher Cross, Michael McDonald, Stephen Bishop, Kenny Loggins and more.
Whether you lived through it or just love it, nothing says smooth like adult
contemporary music. 

Smooth isn't just music, it's an attitude. It's easy joy and love: a soft, sea
breeze blowing through your hair, the sweet sound of waves caressing the
shoreline, making love at midnight on the dunes of the cape, sailing that
takes me away to where I'm going...

All mobile water craft are heartily
encouraged to attend!

Bring a cup and your smoothatude!
print_description: Wear yer yacht attire & sip boat drinks w/ music by Loggins,Christopher Cross, Mangione & more. Water craft encouraged to attend. BYOcup & smoothatude

title: Active Meditation
description:
If you're like most of us, you find it difficult, even impossible, to meditate in the traditional manner — that is, to experience inner silence by sitting cross-legged on the floor. You probably feel your mind is noisier, not more silent, than it was before you started. Your body is restless, ill at ease, and — if you do manage to endure the hour — stiff and painful.

     By contrast, this meditation begins with at least one phase of activity. This allows you to loosen up your body and to unburden your mind. Then you are able to move naturally from stress to deep relaxation, silence and stillness.
     And the effect doesn't finish there; with regular practice you will be able to carry an inner centering with you in your regular day, wherever you are and in whatever you are doing.
print_description: Participate in a guided meditation involving movement. Why sit still?

title: Africa Galactica: Pulling the Devils
description: Deep playa, Thursday night, a fire burns bright.  As deep desert travelers gather around the fire, the villagers emerge. Delighted to have surprise guests at their small, mystical village of Kabala, they alert the chief. Carried out on a traditional West African throne, the chief comes to greet the crowd and welcome them to his village. Speaking in his tribal language of Mende, he teaches the crowd something of his ancestry and asks if they would like to be inducted into their secret society. The ritual begins, and in addition to the initiation, the chief has decided that they will “pull the devils” in honor of their new visitors. As drumming and traditional Sierra Leonean instruments thump throughout the “village”, masked dancers emerge, pulling the visitors into the devil’s parade. Traditional bamboo sticks are given away so that the visitors can play along with the staccato rhythm of the devil’s dance song. Finally, the devil emerges: both frightening and powerful, good and mischievous, the devil plays with the deep playa visitors. A dance ensues, mixing traditional Sierra Leonean beats with modern house and hip-hop.
print_description: BRC's first Sierra Leonean ambassadors "pull the devil" in this masquerade and initiation ritual. Masked dancers, devils, and afro-inspired beats.

Ask Doc Do, or anyone from the Limulus Polyphemus family, for a Horseshoe Crab airbrush tattoo.  Or choose from 50 other airbrush tattoo designs. 

We'll give you crabs!

title: Alien Invasion
description:
ALIEN INVASION--THE EASY WAY TO FIND US

Look for a 10' weather balloon attached to a 500' + foot tether. Flying from the sphere will be around 150 colorful flags, some of which are 20' in length.

Regardless of where you are on the playa, you will be able to experience prayer in action simply by looking for the colorful sway of reverent peaceful glory touched by nature's whim that will penetrate the stratosphere like Jack And The Bean Stalk.

WE TAKE HUMANS BORN IN CAPTIVITY; WE REHABILITATE THEM--AND THEN...THEY ARE RELEASED INTO THE WILD FOR THE FIRST TIME!!!

Pure beauty. Come and see.

title: Aliens like to party.
description:
XPAT ALIEN, if you don't already know us and love us, is your friendly neighborhood alien circus. A collaborative melting pot of personality from across the universe, we are here (and there) to entertain and intoxicate.

Bring your bottles and your booties to the Crop Circle Cantina. Anal probing will not be necessary, if you should simply shake your ass and dance to the tunes of Blingfaced and friends. Drink to your heart's content, as we will be serving up tasty libations such as icy-cold, sweet, delicious vodka/rum drinks as well as beers(ssss). Bring your own cup, or you will not be served. Throwaway plastic is for tourists; XA is here to stay!

Climb on the bar because where else can you session 6 bar-top poles and shimmy your way to 14' above ground, to monkey around? Where? huh?? What? Where!?!?? You won't find another like it, in this galaxy! Oh, and let's not forget, two more lower profile poles, for the exhibitionist newbies and those afraid of heights.
print_description: Climb, dance, play and drink at the Crop Circle Cantina, beneath an 80' spaceship shade structure. What planet are you from?

title: Andrea Olson: Extinguishing Anger with The Arts
description:
How do we go about evolving our collective anger as a race of intelligent beings? How do we convert the power of destruction into its sister energy: the power of creation? One of the most compelling things we can do is travel to the root of anger and heal from the inside out. Andrea will present about her studies with violent offenders...how she utilized movement and expressive arts to stimulate the deep healing of the whole person, including foremost the inherent potential for violence. We will have group discussions, hands-on experimentation, and a presentation of the study.

Andrea Olson is a counselor and dance/expressive arts practitioner from the West Coast.
print_description: How do we convert the power of destruction into the power of creation? Movement and artistic expression can heal violent offenders.

description:
The Antfarm Presents ~ Black Mambas Voodoo Imaginarium B & 2:45
Join us in our breathtaking, thermal regulated structure that encloses our New Orleans style club with second story balconies, air conditioning and of coarse...the world famous, come hell or high water, Hurricane Bar.  We also celebrate the launch of Nu’Era transparent theatre with the Voodoo band, sultry burlesque, dancers from Broadway to bboys, storytellers, beat boxers and slam poets to boot. 

Come in and perform WHATEVER YOU WANT. Be warned, this is not for the faint at heart yet completely open to drop your load.  

Cabaret runs from Wednesday through Sunday and goes from way late to wicked early. 

Special performances include; Souleye of BLVD, March Fourth Marching Band (midnight friday), the Black 22's, The Breakup show, Lantz Lazwell & Kim Manning, dj’s Louie Bagel’s, Primal Luxe, Jeremy Sole, Shiva, Oscure & Potion Potion, and many many more.

title: Apres Ski Chalet
description:
a·près-ski    Pronunciation[ah-prey-skee, ap-rey-]–noun

1. The period of relaxation that follows skiing.

 

 

Apres ski enjoys a rich cultural heritage at ski resorts throughout the world, and we have brought this same magic to the Playa.  Apres Ski  BRC  has evolved this year into a chillin' alpine chalet where after a long day on the slopes, you can come in and enjoy some old-fashioned hospitality. Mingle with snow men, frolic with ski bunnies, and relax those tired muscles in our winter wonderland.   Take pictures of you and your friends racing and skiing the slopes outside our chalet and later, when its cold and dark, have a hot cocoa before you take your tired bunny back home. Ski shots, ice shots and gondola shots randomly gifted… old skool tunes and the possibility of a snowstorm always to be expected!!  

Snow predicted - Wed Sept 2nd, 5-9:00pm.
print_description: Apres Ski Chalet: Mingle & relax in our chill’n chalet.  Pics skiing the slopes, shotski, ice shots, gondola & a snowstorm always expected.

description: Artistic Evolutions, moderated by Daniel Pinchbeck Artist round-table discussing the evolution of art at Burning Man, personal artistic process, and the experience of creating large scale art on the playa. Featuring Michael Christian (Keynote, IT, Elevation, Koilos), Peter Hudson (Homouroboros, Tantalus, Deeper ), Kate Raudenbush: (Braindrop, Altered State, Guardian of Eden), Harlan Emil: (11:11 diamond portal, 1:11 saphire portal) and others. moderated by Daniel Pinchbeck
print_description: Burning Man Artists discuss personal artistic process and the experience of creating large scale art on the playa. moderated by Daniel Pinchbeck

description:
The Art Model camp provides a place to do figure drawing, and/or pose for drawings.  Male and female models, 5-20 minute poses, with some artist supplies available (sketch pads and pencils, charcoal).

Noon to 3 pm Monday through Sunday, with a bar afterward (for as many days as the booze lasts).

Located in the AEZ camp.

description: Many people think they’re better than everyone else, but some of us really are. If you don’t, then you really shouldn’t even be reading this.  All the worthy are invited to join us for Krug Grande Cuvee champagne and Almas Beluga caviar at sunset.

title: A Tour of The Tree of Life
description:
Darwin uses the metaphor of a great tree to describe the relationship
between all living things. Come take a tour guided by a guy who tries
to rebuild the tree for a living. We'll discuss the core of life and
whats its been doing for the past 4 billion years, as well the
molecular fossils being used to reconstruct life's history. Be warned:
you're not as different from bacteria as you'd like to think. Lots of
pretty protein structures!

Please bring your questions on Evolution!
print_description:
Darwin uses the metaphor of a great tree to describe the relationship
between all living things. Come take a tour of life!

title: Balsa Man Regional
description:
Join your fellow lovers of all things tiny at the Black Rock Desert!
Are you driving all the way up to the middle of nowhere in the Nevada desert, with nothing to do? Do you have a tiny art piece that would be perfect at Balsa Man but can’t make it all the way to the main event in San Francisco? Then head over to the official Black Rock Desert Balsa Man Regional!

Tiny Artists and other participants are welcome. Artists are encouraged apply for a tiny art grant to bring some tiny art to the first Black Rock Desert, Balsa Man Regional. For more info on tiny art grants visit: http://balsaman.org/tiny-art-grants/
print_description: Do you have tiny art that would be perfect at Balsa Man but can’t go all the way to the main event in San Francisco? Then come to the Balsa Regional!

title: Be Judged by the Sinister Minister
description:
The Sinister Minister will ask for confessions, give penances, offer communion, and may accept indulgences.  Only the creative and truly perverse will pass on to Nirvana - others will need to seek their life on another path.

Potential penitents will prove they are worthy to enter the Confession Booth and be judged by our Sinister Minister.  If their confession is both creative and perverse, they will be allowed to enter the Communion Tent.  If they are judged to be unworthy, they will be banished to the Excommunication Purgatory to consider their lowly state and attempt to make penance for being dull.  Successful applicants will be led in the sacred communion rites of the Priest of the Perverse and are at the mercy of the presiding Potentate.  Our newly approved acolytes will partake in an underground art (Or Drinking) experience like no other; both brilliant and devilishly twisted.
print_description: The Sinister Minister will ask for confessions, give penances, offer communion, and may bestow gifts upon the creative and truly perverse.

title: Belly Dance Class - Shake it till you make it
description:
We'll learn the basic movement vocabulary of Middle Eastern dance (aka belly dance). We'll learn some combinations and a short choreography.  If there is interest, we'll plan for a group performance on Fri.
This class is fun, engaging and improves your posture, attitude & rhythm! Please bring a large scarf to wrap around your hips. Flat shoes, socks or bare feet are OK. No heels.
print_description: Learn the graceful, elegant & sensuous moves of belly dance. All ages, genders, flexibility & skill levels welcome!

title: Between you and me: Touch Peace
description: A focused exploration on how we approach connections with others. We will explore what thoughts, movement, distractions come up when we make contact, eye or physical contact, with another . We will have the opportunity to explore the moment of connection and see our current and available choices on how to be with each other. Come to expand your ability to be present with people and yourself, with full appreciation and joy. We will use exercises inspired by Authentic Movement, Contact Improvisation, Improv Theater and Diversity Training. You will also have the opportunity to participate in an inspiring performance, creating stillness, presence and connection in the buzzing playa world.
print_description: A focused exploration on how we approach connections with others. We will explore what thoughts, movement, distractions come up when we make contact.

We MARCH AT 7PM this year and will go after dark with a special light show/enlightenment ceremony. So, evening fur recommended and pack your carrot juice for a full night!  

Following this year’s blow-out Billion Bunny March, all bunnies will be celebrating at the Buddha Bunny, near the Man. There will be a ceremony at sunset with original music, dancing, fire and performance, which will awaken the bunny’s 7th and final chakra, bringing us to “enlightenment”. To celebrate the Buddha Bunny’s awakening, Disorient will host a dance party afterward with cocktails.

title: Black Rock Arts Foundation
description:
Exquisite Corpse

Every year, we host an art-making activity that bridges the gap between those who are able to visit BRC, and those who cannot. This year we embrace Burning Man's theme, Evolution, bringing into play a fun side note in art history: the game of Exquisite Corpse. Exquisite Corpse is best known as a collaborative drawing game invented by the Surrealists.

Stop by The Culture Labs to play a game with us. Others who aren't able to join us on the playa this year have sent us incomplete games. On playa we'll finish these games and send them back to them, postmarked BRC.
 
Get under The Microscope!

In collaboration with our camp mates and friends from the Burning Man Regional Network, we've created a giant petri dish, complete with giant microscope! Our microscope has a video camera inside. We invite you to lie in a petri dish of plushy micro-organisms and speak about your personal evolution. Recordings will be projected at night on a 50 foot screen.
print_description: Visit BRAF and learn about our year-round, off-playa art projects and programs. Join in a game of Exquisite Corpse and experience our Holy Macroscope!
other_location: BRAF / The Culture Labs, Esplanade & Evolution Outer Circle at 10:30

title: Black Rock City 48 Hour Film Project 2005-2008
description:
Come see the results of the Black Rock City 48 Hour Film Project! Each of 
these movies was made in 48 hours on the playa. "Cinderplaya" features a 
wizard searching for his playa love. "Portaman" discovers a mastermind's 
plan to destroy Burningman. "Sister Lucy" helps burners learn about sex. 
During "Abandon ALL Hope and Fear", a dream teaches the way of the playa. 
More movies included. At Videogasm. Bring your own chair or tarp. (Want 
to make a film? Stay after and join a team, or follow the instructions 
poster found at PlayaInfo and Videogasm.)

title: Black Rock City Animal Control Run
description:
For 9 years BRCAC has been keeping the playa safe from stray, wild and vicious animals. Come out to the esplanade to see Animal Control Officers net, tag and inoculate the playa's wild animals. Our Animal Control Van will be patrolling the streets to keep playa citizens safe.

Safety and security from wild and rabid animals in our promise to you on Playa. We make no other promises.

Weddings are great, but we all know that bachelor and bachelorette parties are what we really look forward to.  It’s time to send off all our soon-to-be-betrothed friends Burner style.  So bring your stripper heels and inflatable boobs, because body shots and lap dances are just the beginning.  Its time Black rock City had a Bachelor-Bachelorette party that Bacchus himself would be proud of.

title: Black Rock Solar- talk to us!
description:
Black Rock Solar is committed to creating, implementing and demonstrating a sustainable model for providing alternative energy at low- or no-cost to underserved communities. 

Black Rock Solar started as a project at Burning Man to power part of Black Rock City. We’re named after the Black Rock Desert in which the Burning Man event takes place, a reflection of our deep roots in the Burning Man community.

The staff and board of Black Rock Solar (BRS) will be on site at the Culture Labs daily to discuss what it is that BRS does, and how to get 'plugged in' to alternative energy yourself.

Consult the experts, have a glass of tea, hang out in the shade. Discover what the other Outreach groups (BRAF, Regionals, BWB) are up to. 

We'll have a map of Black Rock City available so you can add your camp with your alternative energy installation to it, and see what the other denizens of our fair city are up to this year.
print_description:
Come visit with BRS- find out what we do and how YOU can do it, too!

Place a pin for your alternative energy installation on our BRC Map!

title: Blood Red Sunrise Party at Heartbeat Amplifier
description:
Friday 4am-8am at the Heartbeat Amplifier Project, between the Man and the Temple.

The Abraxas Dragon art car will thump tunes at the Heartbeat Amplifier Project for an epic "Blood Red Sunrise Party". Dress in blood red, bring bloody marys, and prepare to dance the darkness away to bring in a blood red sunrise set never to be forgotten!

Sit down in one of the relaxing arm chairs at the Heartbeat Amplifier Project and contemplate a sculpture of the human heart. As you place your hands on the arm rests, hear the sound of your heartbeat suddenly throb out of massive bass heavy speakers, echoing into the sky and deep within your core.  A warm light pulses against your face, strobing your eyes with mesmerizing intensity.  A subsonic transducer vibrates your body to the rhythm of your pulse.  All this in complete synchronicity with your heartbeat and in orchestra with the beats of your friends as you relax into sensory overload and trance-like meditation.  Others lay on the vibration platform near the chairs to take in the symphony of human biorhythms as you connect with your own heart and with those around you.

Welcome to the Heartbeat Amplifier and Abraxas Blood Red Sunrise Party!!  

Friday 4am-8am at the Heartbeat Amplifier Project, between the Man and the Temple.

Contact Hitch for more details: yohitch(at)gmail(dot)com
print_description: The Abraxas Dragon art car will thump tunes at the Heartbeat Amplifier for an epic "Blood Red Sunrise Party". Dress in blood red, bring bloody marys!!
other_location: Heartbeat Amplifier Art Installation between Man and Temple

title: Bootie BRC mashup party
description:
Launched in 2003 in San Francisco by DJs Adrian & the Mysterious D, Bootie was the first club night in the United States dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup -- and is now the biggest mashup event in the world, with monthly parties in eight cities on three continents. Mixing and matching every conceivable musical genre, era, and style into one big dance party where everyone feels welcome, Bootie provides the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation -- with free mashup CDs given away like candy!

Bootie BRC is Black Rock City's premier mashup bootleg party, taking two (or more) songs and turning them into one. Mixing and matching every genre, era, and style into one big dance party, Bootie provides the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation -- with mashup CDs given away like candy! Launched in 2003 in San Francisco, Bootie was the first club night in the United States dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup. DJs Adrian, Mysterious D, and Malderor keep your brain guessing and body dancing with creative song combinations, celebrating -- and satirizing -- the many different forms of music. And don’t miss the infamous Midnight Mashup Show! Because one song at a time just isn't enough!
print_description: BRC’s mashup bootleg party, turning 2 songs into 1. DJs Adrian, Mysterious D & Malderor mix every genre, era & style into one big A.D.D. dance party!

title: Bootie BRC mashup party
description: Launched in San Francisco in 2003, Bootie was the first club night in the United States dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup. Now with sister parties in LA, New York, Boston, Paris, and Munich, Bootie mixes and matches every conceivable musical genre, era, and style into one big party where everyone feels welcome. It’s a place where all sounds, cultures, and sexualities can unite on the dance floor. Bootie provides the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation ... with free mashup CDs given away like candy!Resident DJs Adrian & the Mysterious D, along with special guests, will keep your brain guessing and body dancing with creative song combinations, celebrating -– and satirizing -– the many different genres of music. Guest mashup DJs will be featured, as well as the infamous midnight mashup show. Bootie ... because one song at a time just isn't enough.
print_description: DJs A+D and guests mix & mash up every genre & style into a fun-ass dance party, combining songs together for the A.D.D. generation! Free CDs!!

title: Booty Shakin' African Dance
description:
Need some new spice for the playa dance floor? Join Carrie and live drummers for an ecstatic African rhythmic experience that will make you move! We will learn traditional celebration dance sequences from West Africa. All levels welcome, dust or shine!

Carrie is a devotee and lover of movement and embodiment in all forms. She is a certified Hatha Yoga teacher and has taught yoga and West African drumming and dance workshops around the world. Carrie has studied with master teachers in Guinea, Mali, and the US, and lives in the San Francisco Bay Area.

title: Buddha Bunny Enlightment Ceremony & Dance Party
description: Following this year’s blow-out Billion Bunny March, all bunnies will be going directly to the Buddha Bunny, a 21’ tall meditating rabbit sitting in full lotus near the Man. There will be a ceremony at sunset with original music, dancing, fire and performance, which will awaken the bunny’s 7th and final chakra bringing him to “enlightenment”. This enlightenment sets off a series of mind-blowing lighting effects incorporated in the art project, all of which are controllable by the Burning Man participants. To celebrate the Buddha Bunny’s awakening, we jump right in with big Disorient sound, dancing and cocktails.
print_description: Join ANIMUS, BBM & DISORIENT at sunset at the BUDDHA BUNNY, a 21’ Meditating Bunny by the Man for ceremony of enLIGHTenment, a MIND-BLOWING LIGHT SHOW

title: Bullhorn Snark Boot Camp For Beginners
description: Have you ever found yourself in possession of a bullhorn in Black Rock City but found that your ability to make burners laugh at the expense of other burners is less than adequate? Have you ever made a joke about "Line Camp" thinking it was a clever quip as opposed to a joke older than alkaline dust? Are you just -not- funny and as a result, get no sex? If any of this sounds like it could be you, or if you just yearn to be like those assholes that rove the playa verbally assassinating anyone who cocks a goggle at them funny, this is the class for you! This class is aimed at sculpting megaphone users into viable, humorous, and entertaining participants in the burning man experience (at the expense of others, obviously), instead of simply arming abusive retards with a loudspeaker. The class includes a seminar followed by a field trip to a bar for lubrication before descending upon the Playa for practical application. Taught by Christopher Ory of Interpretive Arson (MC of Dance Dance Immolation & Fire Idol) & Indigo of Death Guild (ThunderDome's Bullhorn Maestro & Founder of The United States Snark Special Forces Assault Squad), TA: EdRabbit of Interpretive Arson (Usually the last one to get the joke, usually the joke, certified megaphone operator)
print_description: We aim to sculpt megaphone users into entertaining participants in the bman experience (at the expense of others). Includes seminar and field-trip.

title: Burning Lanterns Project
description:
We are a coalition of unapologetic dreamers wanting to be the change we want to see in the world... we created this project to have fun and inspire people around us to dream a bit, get away from daily worries for a moment or so and hopefully leave a smile on their faces... 

So here is the plan, we are going to Burning Man and we know many of our loved ones can not... It is considered good luck to release a sky lantern, and many Asian's believe they are symbolic of problems and worries floating away... so here it is, a simple way to send your worries away, your wishes to heavens, set your dreams free or reach to a lost loved one...

Post your messages to lost loved ones, wishes, dreams to our wall and we will write them on sky lanterns and set them free on 5th of September during burning man to heavens... 

As you will see it will make you feel better and we will make world a better place one smile at a time... 

Join us and post a message to our wall....  

join us at Facebook 
http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=121242602743
print_description: We have 1000 sky lanterns... send us your messages to lost loved ones, wishes or dreams. We will set them free to heavens on 5th, come join us...

title: BYOBullhorn: Megaphone Pub Crawl
description:
Be Heard! Bring your bullhorn and join forces as we demand drinks and
carry on casual conversation at maximum volume. Hijinx ensue! ***
Starts at ATTOL, wanders through the city, cuts a swath through
darkwads and tourists, and reminds "Frat Camp Friday" that there's
some indigenous culture to BRC that you gotta respect. Besides, how
else can you chat up a playa hottie over the incessant techno-thumping
if you don't have a bullhorn?

title: Cafe Kona
description: Wake up and smell the rich aromas of 100% Kona coffee, freshly ground and brewed daily for a bit of playa decadence. Sample some home-made chai, or relax with an assortment of teas. Learn about what it's like to grow coffee, how to "cup" coffee (did you know there's a flavor wheel for coffee, just as there is for wine and beer?) and a bit about the culture of Hawaii Nei. Listen to soft Hawaiian music and watch the City arise from its slumbers—or head home for a nap.
print_description: Welcome to Above The Limit's morning cafe! Enjoy freshly ground 100% fresh Kona coffee, home-made chai, and teas as the sun rises.

title: Cageless Zoo
description:
Calling All: mamalian mutants, feather'd freaks, acid-head avians, fabulous fishies, rapscallion rodents, rambunctious reptiles and bouncing bunnies. All squackers, squeakers, and nipple snorters. Imaginary organisms, interplanetary insects [survivors of the armageddon] and those subconscious species: Come comingle in the Cageless Zoo at the center of Center Camp and set your inner animal free! Then we flock: spreading & splicing our mutated genetics upon the Playa. So, flap your breasts and fly with us!
B'cogck!

High Noon Tuesday at Center Camp

title: Caleb "Shooter" Schaber Memorial
description: One of Black Rock city's finest poets, journalist, artist and more, Caleb "Shooter" Schaber will be remembered as a liver of life to the extreme. Burning the candle at both ends he championed many and stood for his principles. Today we remember him with a short eulogy and an intimate symbolic burn afterward. People are invited to fold origami cranes ahead of time (Before 6pm) to place at Caleb's burn. Bring bits of wood to burn and add to an organic sculpture.
print_description: Join us, friends and family of Caleb "Shooter" Schaber for a memorial of Black Rock's most outspoken hero.

title: Calling all Droogs
description: Long time no viddy, droog. How goes? O my brothers and trusted devotchkas, don thoust finest and gather. Oh bliss! Bliss and heaven! Join us for an evening resplendent, searching for fat stinking billygoat Billyboy in poison.   Ah, what would Black Rock City look like through the lens of a Clockwork Orange? Dress in your clockwork finest for a freewheeling night on the town filled with moloko plus, ultraviolence (figurative, of course), and a bit of the in-out-in-out.  Dusk on Tuesday evening (8:00pm for those of you gloopy lewdies with watches)
print_description: Long time no viddy, droog. How goes? O my brothers and trusty devotchkas, don thoust finest & gather. Bliss and heaven, Clockwork Orange on the playa!

title: Canvas-a-day
description:
Mob-generated art.  A new canvas with a different color scheme each day, open to all comers who care to fling some paint.

This is an evolution (geddit) of a project we had last year, where a single canvas was placed out for the whole week for everyone to paint on.  Fun as it was, the result couldn't help but be somewhat of a polychromatic blur.  This year we're hoping to explore more lights and darks and form, so we'll be painting from a restricted color palette.  Also, we'll have a new canvas each day so that we can explore different color schemes.

You don't have to be able to Paint, you just have to like doing it!
print_description: Mob-generated art.  A new canvas with a different color scheme each day, open to all comers who care to fling some paint.

title: Car Decon-->Reconstruction Transition Ritual
description:
After our complete dismantling of My Last Car, come to a ritual initiating a 180-degree shift in the process. Initiate the transformation with us...

We will begin phase II: you are invited to a question, with the wreckage of this car and its paradigms at our feet. What will we evolve the car into?
print_description: After our complete dismantling of My Last Car, come to a ritual initiating a 180-degree shift in the process. Initiate the transformation with us...
other_location: 7:10 & Homonid : Drake's Deconstruction & Paradigm Wreckers Camp

title: Car Deconstruction Awareness Process
description:
Hi, I'm Drake. And this is My Last Car. After being addicted to fossil fuels for some years now, I have decided to get off this sauce. 

And I invite You to the process. I submit to you this car as an offering, a site where we will deconstruct our suicidal transport, collectively, beautifully, finally.

Come take part in the complete dismantling of My Last Car. A symbolic process of human evolution away from fossil fuel addiction and over-consumption. A provocation toward the end of the paradigms that are killing us. A metaphorical ode to the End of the Automobile Era as We Once Knew It.

Your process with the vehicle is open-ended and free to evolve along the lines of however you are inspired to deconstruct yourself and the vehicle. Your process will be facilitated by Drake, with an ethos of Maximum Freedom of Awareness Process + Leave No Trace at all times. 

We have implements of deconstruction a'plenty; feel free to BYOT as well (bring your own tools!).

Until it be a car no more.

Phase I of II. Monday morning through Tuesday evening. 
See calendar for the Transition Ritual and Phase II.

See our film intro at
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=npG-0UH_fos
print_description: Come take part in the complete dismantling of My Last Car. A symbolic process of human evolution away from fossil fuel addiction. Phase I of II
other_location: 7:10 & Homonid : Drake's Deconstruction & Paradigm Wreckers Camp

print_description: Duct Tape is art and you just can't stop yourself from creating stuff with duct tape, right?  Come and join us to try some hands on duct tape crafts.

title: Car REconstruction Awareness Process
description:
Phase I was the complete dismantling of what I have vowed will be My Last Car, ever. Our collective, symbolic provocation away from fossil fuel addiction and overconsumption. You have deconstructed and dismantled the car with your own hands and heart.

Now, Phase II. The wreckage of these paradigms lie in shambles at our feet. You are now invited to a question: What will we evolve the car into? As with the paradigm, so with this car. Come transform the debris of an Era into Something Else Entirely, a new human movement, a hulking car-made post-car memorial provocation toward the beginning of the new paradigms that will sustain us.

We have implements of REconstruction a'plenty; feel free to BYOT as well (bring your own tools! especially stuff that sticks metal to metal!).
print_description: After our complete dismantling of My Last Car, you are invited to participate in Phase II: its transformation into Something Completely Different...

title: Chakras, Relationships & Cultures
description:
We'll examine energetic parallels and how we evolve individually, with others & collectively.  We'll touch on all the chakras, but the focus will be on the root, sacral, solar plexus & heart chakras.

Afterwards, you'll understand the characteristics, behavior and ethics of the lower chakras & why it would be good for us to make the difficult energetic shift to a heart chakra mode of relating.

Go to my website www.pumamarco.com.
Click on "energy centers / chakras".
Then click the line above "crown chakra" to reach an interactive map of the chakras with much more information.
print_description: We'll examine energetic parallels and how we evolve individually, with others & collectively.  Focusing on root, sacral, solar plexus & heart chakras.

title: Chanting of the Lotus Sutra: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
description: Join us in our Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra) In the Lotus Sutra Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own buddha nature. A practitioner of this buddhism through chanting and study can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting together we will study a buddhist concept, answer questions and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us even if you have never chanted before.

As you may know Dutch Ovens take quite some time to cook and mix in the universe changing abilities of Playa Time our serving sometimes can be a belly rumbling wait, while the smell of bacon wafts all around you. To keep you entertained, shocked, embarrassed, involved and educated each person in line will be asked to share one of the below : 1. What when where was your favorite orgasm? 2. Fake an orgasm 3. Experience an orgasm You may be like the young woman who was telling of her favorite orgasm, in our line one year and as her current friend came to realize, the story was not about him! you could see his face change to puzzlement, apprehension, embarrassment and finally he stomped off, to her chagrin! Or you may have liked the young woman who said " I will not be sharing my fav orgasm with you but I will teach you boys something about a thing called the "G" Spot" and proceeded to drop trou and give us all a lesson! title: Chow Time!
description:
We're jumping in head first this year with a two course meal for 50 people per day over the course of 4 days.  Tuesday through Friday at 9pm we're serving up some GI creamed ground beef and your choice of sides!  You can choose either GI glazed carrots or GI southern style green beans!

We're hoping to have coffee as well, but I guess we'll just have to wait and see if we can get the supplies in order.  Under the assumption that we will have coffee it's of course BYOC (Bring Yer Own Cup!) although we'll be providing disposable plates and utensils for the food (I know I know please no yelling at me about that) since it's a little harder to ask people to bring their own plates and utensils.

While relaxing with your meal we'll be showing oldschool propaganda films from WWII and the days of the Cold War.  Our theme involves living on a military base long after an atomic war... get it?  Awesome.  

First come first serve, but we're doing it in waves so showing up a little later than 9pm may be to your advantage!
print_description: Join us at Aftermath for a hot meal after sundown!  We'll be serving up genuine military food for you while you enjoy some oldschool propaganda films!

title: Community Permaculture, smart living design.
description:
Now is the time to relearn how to live together in community and maximize our resources.  Burning man has taught us this importance, and Geofrey Collins is living it on an intentional community he co founded in Topanga, CA.  Come hear some stories of how this process is unfolding from this organic architect burner.

An introduction to permaculture as societal glue, and beyond, how the new paradigm will be designed.  We have all we need to thrive, we just need to reorganize the layout of our living patterns to maximize the abundance through functional family and gender balance. 

Our evolution demands it!  Come hear more ideas from the new edge.

Geo Frey
print_description: Geofrey Collins, founder of an intentional community in Topanga, and green architect will share permaculture knowledge and stories of community living

description:
Becoming undivided: Forgiving Yourself and Others. Our negative charges and judgments toward past events divide us within and darken our ability to be free and love completely. 

Letting go of our inner baggage frees our energy and our heart. Acha Baba will talk and lead discussion on this subject, followed by guided meditation and partner reflections. Let go for your own sake. Bring some inner trash to recycle. Taught by: Acha Baba (Karl Bralich)

title: Consciously Embodied Living
description:
Consciously Embodied Living will put you in touch with your innate resources – helping you develop a more in-tune relationship to your body and sense-of-self.  This program is holistic; based on the belief that the body, mind and consciousness are all aspects of one integrated system. By focusing on how these aspects interact, and by bringing them into greater harmony, you will significantly expand your self-awareness as well as your capacity for authentic self-expression and connection - the fundamental elements of a deeply satisfying life.

 

This workshop will include: one, how to take responsibility for your awareness and your emotions and how to create the conditions that invite and support others to do the same.  Two, how to stand and move in your body in a more aligned, aware and empowered way.

 

The techniques and principles of this program are completely practical, and compatible with any and all belief systems.
print_description: Practical methods for aligning your beliefs and values with how you move through the world - taking responsibility for enjoying the human experience.

title: Critical Tits 14th Annual Bike Ride
description:
Critical Tits 14th Annual Bike Ride:
Critical Tits evolves and rides on!  
The ladies will ride, but THERE IS NO PARTY: no fancy drinks, no art cars, no rave music.  New this year: at the end of the Ride, a Ritual of acknowledgment and heart centered connection; to recognize and celebrate the community of women.  Not for spectators.  We invite partners and friends to help hold the ritual space.  We need volunteers for set up/clean up, bike parking, drumming.
We start at 4:00pm at the Man and the Ritual finishes by 6:00pm.
If you want to get involved, contact us at info2009(at)criticaltits(dot)com.
print_description: All women & girls, please join us for an all-women’s playa bike ride ending in a ritual to celebrate our empowerment.  No party this year.
other_location: Ride starts at the Man; Ritual location not disclosed

Liquid latex body painting can take over an hour to design, paint, and dry.  Multiple layers are recommended.  The Critical Tits Bike Ride (usually) starts at the Man at 4:00.   You will need to be painted by 3:30, so you need to arrive before 2:00. We provide mirrors and liquid latex colored with food-coloring and other (labeled) dyes.  Use our colors or mix your own.  Cloth is available for appliqué.    Females are invited to become participants as artistic/latex-advisors, etc. Jump in for an hour or so on the spot, or contact the e-mail address below.    No spectators. Photography is prohibited.  Safer Sex Camp is a drug free zone (this includes tobacco and alcohol).

description:
Danyavaad plays live original Middle Eastern flavored music featuring the electric sitar and tribal drum beats. Danyavaad creates an atmosphere of Middle Eastern lounge mixed with Indian vibes and rock.

The Shimmy Sisters (Leilainia Penix  and Adelaide Marcus) embellish aspects of creativity and art in their inspiring bellydance performances. Their diverse show may include snakes, swords, candles, fire fingers, isis wings, glow hula hoops, and traditional bellydance props such as veils and zils. They were born into a culture of creativity by their bellydancing mother and artist/musician father.

http://www.danyavaad.com
http://www.theshimmysisters.com
print_description: Danyavaad plays live original Middle Eastern flavored music featuring the electric sitar and tribal drum beats, with belly dancers.

title: Dear You,
description:
Dear You, is a project i started to help bring people together,
and offer release and resonance.

simply write a letter to someone, anyone at all, even your self.
the letter should express something you have always wanted to say,
reveal a secret, untapped desires, crushes, compliments, hurt, anger,
regret, sadness, longing, abstract ideas, anything under the sky.
there will be so many beautiful papers,
writing instruments and hand dyed ribbon available to you. write your letter, and tie it to the lines. watch it float in the wind, read the letters of others, or just simply be.
print_description:
simply write a letter to someone, anyone at all, even your self.
the letters are anonymous and can express anything under the sky.

title: Design My Burning Man Tattoo
description:
Hello fellow Burners. My name is Josh Hayes and I think it's finally time to get my Burning Man tattoo. And who better to design it than the Burning Man community itself right?

I'm looking mostly for a design theme that has The Man in it, but I wouldn't stop you if you had a different idea of course.

We'll have supplies out (paint, pencils, etc....) and two easels if you'd like. I'll have a spot where you can leave your email, so that once I get it tattooed I'll send you a copy of the photo!! Your artwork in action!

title: Dirty Diablo Spins @ ZanZibar
description:
OK, honestly the only thing my lazy ass will probably be spinning on the Playa this year will be my iPod Hard Drive, but I'll be dropin' some dope beats & Very Special Deep House set in honor of Junior, RIP Brother.

No special times but this is THE place.

Something will be played by me @ ZanZibar each day at some random time, so drop by see if our bar is open and I might be playing something your can boogie on down to.

Remember real DJs don't take requests: "So, what do you want to hear, Sucka?"

Will probably go mobile sometimes on the Trike so come Run with the Devil y'all!

I love that House baby, but I gotta SHAKE it up with some Random shit:
~A Funk set in honor of Mighty Joe Boss, RIP too Brother :(
~-80's Underground Dance Music
~OLD-School Rap/Hip-Hop ala, Whodini, Grandmaster Flash, UTFO, Dana Dane, Newcleus, Doug E. Fresh, Break yo' self fool!
~Maybe some Floyd or Miles 



-Nakayama

title: Evolution of Evolution - part 1
description: A two part presentation that looks at the nature of reality, and our conceptualization of time, space and evolution. Our quest for understanding will take us on a journey beginning with our fundamental paradoxes, and move through the many principles of life, reality, time, energy, mater and the universe; topics will include things such as: the Egyptian perpetuating trianary principles, fundamental geometry, liquid crystals, cycles and dualism.
print_description: Presentation covering: Egyptian perpetuating trianaries, fundamental geometry, liquid crystals, and more.

title: Disorient Presents: The Art Car Wash
description:
Calling all Art Cars (and Art Car Lovers)!                                 
Disorient Presents: The Art Car Wash...                                      
The Art Car Wash is a sexy daytime disco and interactive zone for art cars, art car drivers, and anyone who enjoys getting their bumpers buffed.

Disorient invites all mutant vehicles to visit the Art Car Wash, where playa participants will be waiting to greet them, mock "wash" their cars, and groove to daytime DJ sets. Drive through the unique Evolvatron car wash lane, where spinning fuzzy playa versions of the washers and wipers found in a typical automated car wash will "wash" your vehicle. Sexy playa Car Washers will be ‘buffing’, ‘sudsing’, ‘rinsing’ and ‘waxing’ the car to maximum sexiness. After passing through the wash, park your mutant vehicle and join in on the fun! The Art Car Wash will be operated daily by Disorient, but we invite all playa participants to visit Disorient throughout the week and lend a hand with towels, misters, buffy fuzzy things or just yourselves.... Hot wax job, anyone?
print_description: The Art Car Wash is a sexy daytime disco and interactive zone for art cars, art car drivers, and anyone who enjoys getting their bumpers buffed.

title: DIY Tattooing
description:
Come learn DIY tattooing. Safety Pins, India Ink, alcohol swabs, rubbing alcohol, and bandaids provided. 
Bring: clean bandana (or cloth), a dish (for the alcohol/water mix) a bottle cap, a friend and an idea!

Stick and Poke Tattoos are based in tribal tattoo practices, though modern day time you can find tattoo circles at Earth First Rendevous', Student Coops, and Crusty Punk houses. You take something sharp and through a series of punctures through the skin, you too can have your very own, DIY tattoo. Aloe has experience taking the Crusty Punk tattoo culture and sterilizing it to safety. She believes in honor and the pain being part of the growth, which is why she doesn't use thread.....more explained about her philosophy of tattoo honor and practices at the workshop!
print_description:
Safety Pins, India Ink, alcohol swabs, rubbing alcohol, and bandaids provided. 
Bring: clean bandana/cloth, a bowl, a bottle cap, a friend, and idea!

title: Dr. Dan's Big Ass Fun Run
description: Humans evolved the largest ass muscles of all the great apes. They allow us to run upright and we can outrun virtually every other species on Earth over long distance - perfect for hunting! We celebrate our large gluteus maximus ‘big ass’ muscles with a series of three fun runs: Wed, Thu & Fri 6:30 p.m. Tri-tip BBQ Fri. Assemble 6:30 at the Big Ass Fun Run sign, depart at 6:45 (weather permitting). Not fast, not far, but you'll break a happy sweat as we run around the playa together. If you’re a runner, or just looking for a good sweat, get your ass down to the Rhythm Wave Camp Annex to join the fun. Immediately after the Friday run, we'll enjoy a small bite of tri-tip fresh off the BBQ - the spoils of the hunt! Nicest ass (male & female) eat first! Stay after for ecstatic dance with Rhythm Wave at 7:30. www.rhythmwave.org
print_description: Celebrate the evolution of large gluteus maximus ‘big ass’ muscles that allow humans to run upright and hunt. Wed, Thu, Fri 6:30 pm. Tri-tip BBQ Fri.

description: The Eduplaytional Oasis is a dome that will become a school in Ghana, Africa, after the burn. The dome is an opportunity to get inspired. Jamie Luv's story of teaching reproductive health, hooping and organizational development in Ghana began from a thought that she had while leaving the playa in 2007. The story, the dome and the creation of the Eduplaytional Oasis, and what will be the Eduplaytional Village in Ghana, were all inspired by the possibility of Burning Man. title: Evolution is Cleverer Than You Are
description: A million years ago we evolved the mental tools that make us human, including our ability to intuit the presence of minds behind the actions of others. Evolution, however, has a mind that works very differently from ours. Instead of talking about evolution with our new-fangled talking minds, we will play out an evolution exercise with our ancient bodies. Join 19 other burners and live out evolutionary changes within a species. Is it a game, a demonstration, an experiment, or an installed experience? Yes, it is. By Bird.

I have been teaching Engage Love in twelve week series venues and I have so much to share. I teach people how to add love into their lives, more and more on a daily basis, teach them how to make all areas of their lives fun and exciting! I teach them how to understand how their minds work, how their unloving core and universal beliefs are working against them, how to find them, change them and heal the patterns that they have created. It is extraordinarily transformational.

title: Everything You Ever Wanted To Know About 2012
description:
The SHIFT Lecture Series presents Mark Heley, author of "The Everything Guide to 2012: All You Need to Know About Theories, Beliefs, and History Surrounding the Ancient Mayan Prophecy." 

His address will focus on "Worldshift 2012 - Planetization and the Evolutionary Shift of 2012" 
The idea of planetization is that of an expanded frame of reference
that places humanity and the biosphere into a new broader context of a
symbiotic unity. To become planetized is to adopt new ways of thinking
that reflect a holistic viewpoint between humankind and the planet.
A planetized view is one able to conceptually grasp that this
planet is just one of many, from one solar system, among billions of
star systems, among billions of galaxies. The Mayan calendar and the
Vedic Yuga cycle, with their galactic frames of reference, are both
planetized calendars.

Mark's address will precede that of SHIFT Keynote Speaker Daniel Pinchbeck, author of "2012: The Return of Quezalcoatl."
print_description: Mark Heley, author of "The Everything Guide to 2012: All You Need to Know About Theories, Beliefs, and History Surrounding the Ancient Mayan Prophecy"

title: Evolution Cinema Night
description:
Outdoor screenings starting at Twilight

Wednesday night we will be showing cult classics that question our evolution and we are honored to present a new and challenging movie, "Fierce Light – When spirit meets action", by acclaimed filmmaker Velcrow Ripper. In Fierce Light Velcrow Ripper, filmmaker and spiritual seeker, journeys through the world exploring what Martin Luther King called “Love in Action” and Gandhi called “Soul Force”.

In exploring how lasting change can be motivated by love and realized in action, Velcrow interviews spiritual activists such as Thich Nhat Hanh, Desmond Tutu, Daryl Hannah, Julia Butterfly Hill, and others. Through his cinematic journey, Velcrow discovers what Paul Hawken (author “Blessed Unrest”) describes as the largest global movement in history – thousands of individuals and organizations connected by a shared commitment to compassionate, positive action. There is hope for our evolution.

Velcrow Ripper intends to be at Burning Man shooting footage for the third movie in his trilogy to be entitled “Evolve Dissolve: Another World is Here“. If at Burning Man, Velcrow will be on hand during the screening of Fierce Light – When spirit meets action.

Prior to screening "Fierce Light – When spirit meets action", we will screen “Humanity Ascending” with Barbara Marx Hubbard at twilight. This documentary features author and futurist Barbara Marx Hubbard and offers a vision toward our birth as a new humanity – Homo Spiritus.

After screening Fierce Light we will then show Zeitgeist – the underground classic the banks don’t want you to see. Unfortunately it’s not your imagination or the drugs, the shadow government and banking system are really out to own you and the world.

For those who can’t sleep after watching Zeitgeist, we will screen the cult classic Koyaanisqatsi: Life out of Balance (1982). This movie contains neither dialogue nor narration and is essentially a moving visual auditory poem that juxtaposes dramatic image
print_description: Showing  - "Fierce Light – When spirit meets action" with Director Velcrow Ripper attending and “Humanity Ascending”, "Zeitgeist" and "Koyaanisqatsi".

title: Eye Gazing and Mystical Union: An Eyes-On Workshop
description:
We all know that the eyes are the window of the soul. Are you walking around with the curtains to these windows closed to the world?

In this eye-opening 90-minute workshop, you will learn the history and evolution of eye contact, and then you will receive practical instruction on how to improve the quality of your eye contact, with friends, loved ones, lovers, and even strangers, for fostering intimacy, connectedness, and trust.

For the second half of the workshop, you will have the opportunity to experience for yourself the interconnectedness, trance, ego dissolution and divine rapture that can come from deep, prolonged gazing into another's eyes, as a meditative, tantric practice. Sages, yoginis, dakinis, mystics and poets throughout the ages--including Rumi--have seen eye gazing as one of the most powerful and subtly erotic experiences two humans can share. Come experience this power for yourself.

ABOUT THE FACILITATOR:

Michael Ellsberg is the founder of Eye Gazing Parties (www.eyegazingparties.com), the world's first singles events based on eye contact. These were featured in the New York Times, CNN, Good Morning America, and major media around the globe.

He is the author of The Power of Eye Contact, coming out from HarperCollins in February 2010.
print_description: Experience the intimacy, trance, ego dissolution and juicy divine rapture that can come from gazing deeply into anothers eyes.

title: Face Reading Seminar
description:
The face is the index of the mind. It reveals the nature of childhood, past lives, and gives insight into the individual’s propensities and aptitude.  The basic idea behind Vedic face reading is that your gross physical body is lying on your subtle body which has been in development for many lifetimes

In this regard the whole body can be a source of information. Some of this is described in the Vedic text dedicated to this subject (Samudrika Shastra).  Although the whole body carries information the face is the most informative part of the body because it is the most muscularly complex.

Face reading is a fascinating tool for exploring who we are, as well as learning what is possible, both for us and others. After all knowledge is power.
print_description: The  face is the index of the mind. It reveals the nature of childhood, past lives, and gives insight into the individual’s propensities and aptitude.

The face is the index of the mind. It reveals the nature of childhood, past lives, and gives insight into the individual’s propensities and aptitude.  The basic idea behind Vedic face reading is that your gross physical body is lying on your subtle body which has been in development for many lifetimes

In this regard the whole body can be a source of information. Some of this is described in the Vedic text dedicated to this subject (Samudrika Shastra).  Although the whole body carries information the face is the most informative part of the body because it is the most muscularly complex.

Face reading is a fascinating tool for exploring who we are, as well as learning what is possible, both for us and others. After all knowledge is power.
print_description: The face is the index of the mind. This workshop will go over the fundamentals of learning to read faces.

title: Free Photography Zone
description: John Brennan founder of Free Photography Zone has been photographing the participants of BM in a studio setting for 13 years.  Each person photographed is given a Polaroid print of themselves to remember his/her moment at Burning Man. Over the years I have photographed and watched families grow, welcomed new and old burners and always tried to give each person the best possible portrait of themselves. This is all done in a studio setting with proper strobe lighting and larger format film cameras. Over the years I have made over 30,000 2 1/4 x 2 3/4" negatives (never really counted) which probably makes this one of the largest archives of  portraits available of Burning Man.  I photograph each day and night for the entire event.   I hope you will take the time to visit my camp and be photographed.
print_description: Free Photography Zone for 13 years photographing BM participants and giving each person a print to memoralize thier BM experience.

title: Geology of the Black Rock Desert
description: Ever wondered how those amazing land forms all around Black Rock City? Come and learn from Terry Wright, PhD. retired professor of geology from Sonoma State University. His specialty is bringing the latest interpretations of mountain building and plate tectonics to the creative general public.  He will focus on the origin of the bedrock units and mountains of the black rock desert in terms of plate tectonics finishing with the recent history of faulting and lake deposits.
print_description: Ever wondered how those amazing land forms in the BRD? Come and learn from Terry Wright, PhD. He will focus on the origin of mountains of the desert.

title: Goddess Gathering - 6th Annual Event
description: History- Goddess gathering began in 2004 when the members of the burning women tribe wanted to meet. We named it goddess gathering in deference to the loving way Bare calls us all goddess'. What this event has always been is members of this tribe bringing something to share with each other and casualy enjoying our time together.  What can you bring? ANYTHING!  Popular choices:  wine, tea, lemonade, other beverages, snacks of all types cookies, chips, crackers, cheese, fruit etc.  pretty stuff.... nail polish, foot stuff, vinegar, pipe cleaners, ribbons, bindis, face paint, henna  services- massage, singing, music, dance, etc., gifts to share - but most of all bring you!  GG is planned to be at 417 and DNA, or 417 and B, or close to that. There will be a flag in front of our camp that say "417" and in smaller print on the flag. "Bare's Camp"

title: GODSPELL (the musical)
description: Camp Mystic and Cosmic Cowboy present a Burning Man Inspired Evolutionary production of the musical GODSPELL. One of the biggest off-Broadway and Broadway successes of all time, Godspell is based primarily on the Gospel According to St. Matthew.As the cast of actor/clowns makes it way through its songs, we, as audience members get to see the parables of Jesus Christ come humanly and heartening to life. The show also touchingly presents the story of Jesus' last moments beginning with the Last Supper.

title: Grand Procession in Honor of Lou Genise
description:
We are organizing a grand, New Orleans style jazz funeral procession in Lou's honor and we want YOU (yes, you, Mr/s Poopy Pants) to participate!

We hope to see you in your finest, funkiest, furriest, nakedest, silliest, loudest playawear If you are a musician and can bring your instrument (or any instrument) to the playa, please do so. For those of you who are not or cannot, KAZOOS will be provided!!  30 minutes before sundown The Grand Procession will begin the  S L O W   pilgrimage to The Temple. Funeral hymns and slow dirges will be played as we mourn the loss of our beloved.

Once we reach the temple, we will hold space for people to share stories, poems, and songs by, about or in honor of Lou. Everyone and anyone is encouraged to share if they feel so compelled. During the sharing, the ethereal sounds of gongs, singing bowls and other tribal/ancient noise-makers will be heard (so again, if you have this stuff, bring it). 

As the sharing comes to its natural end, and in celebration of the life that still courses through those that loved Lou and in gratitude for the memories we are lucky enough to retain, The Grand Procession will commence its boisterous, joyous, fiery, celebratory meandering return to the FunCult Camp, where we will party in honor of the funny, talented, brilliant, silly, loving, supportive, haiku-loving, leather-working, story-telling, sugar-feinding, egg-poaching, jewelry-making, appreciator-of-all-things-small, fire-breathing man we all loved so much.
print_description: New Orleans style jazz funeral procession & pilgrimage to the Temple for stories & songs, followed by boisterous, fiery, return to FunCult for party.

title: Heartbeat Amplifier Live Music Jam
description:
Wednesday 9-11pm at Heartbeat Amplifier between Temple and the Man.  Come all with your music - guitars, sitars, hangs, drums, trumpets and trombones - and jam out together and sing to the amazingly amplified heartbeats of your friends!

Bring music back to its roots, the human heartbeat.  Have your own pulse amplified out over bass heavy speakers as your friends find the rhythm, improvise incredible tunes, and create beautiful music to the most instinctual of sounds.

~~~~~~

Imagine...
As you walk with friends at night through the cool desert air you happen upon a huge red-lit platform and walk to its center.  You decide to sit down in the 3 comfortable arm chairs and contemplate a sculpture of the human heart. As you place your hands on the arm rests, the sound of your heartbeat suddenly throbs out of massive bass heavy speakers, echoing into the sky and deep within your core.  A warm light pulses against your face, strobing your eyes with mesmerizing intensity.  A subsonic transducer vibrates your body to the rhythm of your pulse.  All this in complete synchronicity with your heartbeat and in orchestra with the beats of your friends as you relax into sensory overload and trance-like meditation.  Others lay on the vibration platform near the chairs to take in the symphony of human biorhythms as you connect with your own heart and with those around you.
...Welcome to the heartbeat amplifier project.  

~~~~~~
print_description: Wednesday 9-11pm at Heartbeat Amplifier between Temple and the Man. Bring live instruments and your pulse and jam out to the heartbeats of your friend
other_location: Heartbeat Amplifier Art Installation between Temple and Man

title: Heart Opener Workshop
description:
Heart Opener Workshop
Join Pete Guinosso as we practice a strong vinyasa style yoga class 
that focuses on backbends to open the heart.
Heart-openers help expand the heart center and help you connect to 
spirit while helping to move through
any depressive/anxiety feelings that you may be harboring to create an 
overall sense of health and well-being.
Forrest Yoga sequencing and principles will be used.
We will finish with a mediation on love and gratitude.
all levels welcome - prior experience beneficial.
print_description:
Join Pete Guinosso as we practice a strong vinyasa style yoga class 
that focuses on backbends to open the heart.

title: High Tea in The Garden
description: Blimey!  How could we create a garden environment and not offer high tea?  The Garden of DeLights formally requests the honor of your company for a spot of hot tea in our posh, illuminated garden.  Across the pond high tea would traditionally be served before nightfall.  But since The Garden of DeLights is best viewed after dark, our high tea will commence at 10:00pm.  We think a civilized pot of Earl Grey would be smashing on a cold playa night.  Certainly some wankers will say it’s not a party if you’re not getting bladdered and snogging someone, but we say that’s a bunch of codswallop.  If you’re more of a coffee or cocoa type of chap, pick up a spot at the Café and bring it back to The Garden.  We’ll be serving until our bags dry up.  Ta.
print_description: You are formally invited for a spot of hot Earl Grey in our posh, illuminated garden. We’ll be serving until our bags dry up.

title: Homeopathy: A Modern Medical Alchemy
description:
Dana Ullman will talk and dialogue with you about understanding the science, art, and alchemy of homeopathic medicine. Homeopathy is a type of medical aikido, medical biomimicry, and nanopharmacology. It is a powerful method of augmenting immune response to create real healing, as distinct from the suppression of disease.  

Dana Ullman is world-renown for authoring 10 books in the field, publishing over 30 books of his colleagues, authoring several chapters in leading medical textbooks, and speaking at various medical schools and universities.  

Let's talk...
print_description: One of America's leading authors and educators on homeopathy will provide insight into homeopathy, energy medicine, alchemy, and real healing...

title: Hungover Physical Therapy
description: Suffering from whiplash from raving all night? Back pain from silhouette sex? Neck pain from sleeping on a crappy thermarest? Foot pain from walking all the way home after just missing that art car your friends got on? Come to camp Fickleodeon's own physical therapy clinic hosted by Dr. Rainbow. Maybe you'll get some bodywork; maybe he'll show you a few stretches; maybe you'll get a kombucha cocktail and some peeled grapes; maybe he'll make you work out your core until your abs are bleeding. No appointments necessary--he'll just be doing his best to help you on a first come, first serve basis.

title: Hypnosis For Increasing Pleasure
description:
It's not just for quitting smoking or changing bad habits.  Hypnosis can also improve your experience of what's already good, making it even better!
It's safe, effective and we promise not to make anyone bark like a dog or cluck like a chicken.  This is a safe environment.
So come and enjoy a relaxing trance break while we massage your mind and make it even more receptive to heightened pleasure of all kinds.
John Goelz has over 20 years of experience with Hypnosis and NLP and many more years of appreciating the benefits of altered states of consciousness.
print_description: Mind Massage to take what’s good and make it better! Come and enjoy a relaxing trance break, in a safe environment.

title: It's Ice-o-lution Baby!
description:
Snow Cones, Shaved Ice, at the Nice Mouse Ice House.
  The Nice Mice are having Afternoon Ice Shaving parties, 1pm to 3pm, Monday to Saturday as the ice lasts. Hot Kids can ask anytime.

The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thoughts toward him for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. title: Kundalini Yoga
description:
A power FULL yoga class to launch you into your inner vastness of amazing self knowledge. All levels welcome, no experience required. 

Kundalini uses sets of physical exercises (kriyas) and/or breathing techniques (pranayam) in harmony with other tools such as mantra (sound current), mudra (hand positions), drishtis (eye focal points) and bhands (body locks) to intensify the effects of the kriya.

These very simple but highly effective techniques and exercises are done alone or in combination. Developed over the millennia, these empowering techniques produce immediate results. They quickly and effectively clean the blood and body of toxins. They build strength and endurance on many levels. They clear the mind of unwanted and unhealthy thought patterns. And, they create new opportunities for growth and prosperity in life.
print_description: A power FULL yoga class to launch you into your inner vastness of amazing self knowledge. All levels welcome, no experience required.

title: Learn Karen Burmese massage basics
description:
The Karen are a diverse people in the nation of Burma, now Myanmar. The Karen were originally animists, and today most are Buddhists or Christians. Some of their 1,700 year old tradition remains to this date, although often cloaked in Buddhism or Christianity. The Karen healers once traveled village to village, dispensing free health care, psychiatric care, marriage counseling, communications with those who passed, and so on. Their services were free, and they were held in high esteem. Some of their knowledge survived to this day. A practitioner of this modicum isn't allowed to charge for healing, so naturally there is very little knowledge or interest in this ancient tradition. We'll be concentrating on the massage side of the modicum, which in addition to bringing relief was also believed to promote good health and longevity. We'll be reviewing some very basic massage and energy work techniques, the Burmese ideas of body/energy connections, and the art of Regarding. lesson plan: - Intro to Karen Burmese philosophy and beliefs. - Very brief explaining the Grid system, similar to the Chinese meridian system. - Massage techniques
facilitator experience:
Workshop led by Ron Hod, one of only 3 non-Karen practitioners of Karen Burmese healing techniques, who has been practicing for 14 years. The church leaders who once offered the training no longer do so, so further training can only be achieved in Thailand or Myanmar (Burma). Ron is initiated, attuned, and aligned in the Karen Burmese art of Opendove Form (/Open Dove Form) modicum, a system of energy and body work that dates back over 1,700 years. The workshop is open to anyone interested in massage, not just body or energy workers. http://karen.org/ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karen_people http://www.geocities.com/rainbowendsfr/karen/history.htm
print_description: learn this ancient tradition believed to relieve pain, loosen muscles, and promote good health and longevity.
