title: Liberate Your Inner Dancer with Andrea Olson
description:
Do you feel "okay" dancing in public but wish it felt easier? Do you feel so self-conscious about dancing that you watch from afar until the alcohol has kicked in, and then maybe dance? Are you frozen at the mere idea of actually dancing in public?

In this workshop you will learn 9 exercises that will help you:
  . Liberate yourself from fear
  . Break through insecurities
  . Get in touch with your body, and,
  . Most importantly, learn how to rock out on the dance floor without giving a damn what anyone else thinks!

We will also discuss limiting beliefs around dancing in public, and explain and demonstrate "liberated dance."

Absolutely no prior dance experience necessary....and if you've got dance experience, come inspire others!
print_description: Do you feel “okay” dancing in public but wish it felt easier? Learn how to rock out on the dance floor without giving a damn what anyone else thinks!

title: Liquid Flame Effects Class
description: So you're a fire artist, right? You've mastered the basic propane accumulator/solenoid flame effect, a.k.a. poofer/puffer, and you're looking for something new to try? Liquid effects are what you want! In this class we'll go over what we have learned concerning liquid flame effects including fuels, pressurization systems, purge systems, chemical compatibility for your plumbing, colorants for methanol, nozzle design, and the new California flame thrower laws. This class will assume at least a basic understanding of flame effects, but of course all are welcome. Will also include a quick walk through of the Gee-Gnome Project's liquid shooter!  Taught by Peter Youngmeister, Rosa Anna De Filippis, and John DeVenezia from The Gee-Gnome Project, Interpretive Arson, and Flaming Lotus Girls
print_description: Large-scale liquid flame effect class, taught by members of the Gee-Gnome project. Assumes basic understanding of flame effect design and safety.

title: Little Black Dress Parade
description: The long standing tradition continues again in 2008.  Friday afternoon at 5pm, Spanky's Wine Bar and the famous Burning Band will host the LBD.  Males and females alike will don thier wildest, most elaborate, sexiest and/or skimpiest little black dresses and follow and sing with the greatest marching band on the playa, through the streets of Burningman to Center Camp and back.  Those with marching band instruments (yes, kazoos count) are welcomed to join the band.  Rumors are in the air that there will be quite a few Burning Band members in camp this year!  Huzzah!!!!!  This is a long standing playa tradition, so be sure to include an LBD in your Burningman packing list this year.

title: Live Music: Gaura Vani & As Kindred Spirits
description:
Seek the Nectar! Come sing, dance and fly with the honeybees of devotional world-music! Dive into the lotus of ecstasy. Escape the illusion, confusion, pollution, and delusion with As Kindred Spirits. The music of As Kindred Spirits is the sound of cultures colliding.

Join this sacred world-music experience and discover the uplifting power of As Kindred Spirits. Rich ethnic rhythms and melodies, with fresh western harmonies and grooves, are crafted with the ancient tradition of kirtan or devotional Indian musical meditation, creating music that is both hip and inspired. You will not be able to resist the urge to dance! And sing! Sing! 

As Kindred Spirits features the voice and harmonium of Gaura Vani, and the rhythms and melodies of multi-instrumentalist Shyam Kishore, along with a multicultural group of talented musicians, dancers and performers. 
Allow this music to place you in direct contact with the Divine through the universal language of sacred dance and music.
print_description: High-Energy Kirthan. Seek the Nectar! Escape the illusion, confusion, pollution, and delusion... dive into the lotus of ecstasy!

title: Live Music & Performances
description:
Tsunami was created to bring LIVE music and performance back to the Esplanade, something we felt was missing from Burning Man for several years.  

This year we are hosting some great music and musicians.  Come see Kim Manning of the "PFunk All Stars" sing with guitar god Lantz Lazwell and maybe even join in their "Jam Factory" (http://www.kimmanning.com or http://www.myspace.com/lantzlazwell).  We'll also have "Bonus Plus Plus" from Germany and the "Temple Bhajan Band" (www.templebhajanband.com) gracing our stage this year. 

We are also hosting a Poetry Throwdown on Saturday afternoon curated by Jay Beazly of Chicago.  All poets and spoken word participants are welcome to join in! 

There are opportunities for YOU to perform and we may be able to schedule your performance so please stop by and we'll see if we can make you famous this year.
print_description: Tsunami is amongst other things a live performance stage.  Nightly live music and performances of all types. Some walk-ups accepted for scheduling.

title: LONGEVITY STICK Exercises
description:
LONGEVITY STICK exercises at Cartoon Commune, 8-9AM, Monday-Sunday.
This is a set of 12 exercises, originally developed by Vietnamese doctor, Master Mai Bac Dau.
Please bring a 1” dowel or strong, light pole or stick of your height. It will be used in the exercise set. 12 movements designed to improve balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity and vitality. The exercise, which is done while standing, takes its name from the only piece of equipment used in its practice. 
This is a low impact exercise, safe for adults and most all seniors. This art reduces the risk of injuries while performing movements to help with circulation, balance as well as breathing techniques.
This art is spreading throughout California and the US as well as France, Canada, and Australia. 
Check it out at: www.longevitystick.com
print_description:
LONGEVITY STICK exercises at Cartoon Commune, 8-9AM Mon-Sun
Developed by Vietnamese Dr, Master Dau
Please bring a 1” dowel/pole/stick of your height

title: Make Your Own Mini Manifesto
description:
One-Minute Manifesto: Express & Publish Your Own Doctrine!

Does the world know of your genius? What do you want to get off your chest? Do you believe in three-titted witches? What would life be like if you rewrote all the rules? Can you explain exactly how you got yourself into this mess? Declare anything you’d like—how to change the world or how to change your underwear! We’ll be collecting hundreds of manifestos, and with your permission, your manifesto will be published in a print edition zine to be distributed free of charge to all who request it. Visit Camp FickleOdeon to write, draw, create the plan.
print_description: Write, draw, create the plan. Not lots of time, so do it mini style. All submissions to appear in FREE zine. Join the project at FickleOdeon.

title: Manifesting Your Evolution
description:
We evolve from experiences that introduce variation - and the selection of variants that best-suit our environment. If your personal evolution has rendered you highly adaptable to adversity, but you don't want to pass along your genetics, then spread around your survival strategy. This talk will include five suggestions for manifesting your evolutionary tactics and encouraging more mutation in the population.


Annie Harrison is the founder of the Women's Visionary Congress (WVC). Created in 2007, the WVC http://www.visionarycongress.org/ is an annual gathering that brings together women healers, scholars, researchers, activists and artists who cultivate the expansion of consciousness and work for sustainable social change. This is her fourteen consecutive year at Burning Man. In 2008, Annie co-founded the Women's Visionary Council, a nonprofit organization that supports the WVC and related community service projects.
print_description: Activist/journalist Annie Harrison (CNN, NPR) gives a talk on empowerment and manifesting your own evolution for the SHIFT lecture series.

title: Marriage Equality Workshop for L.A. & CA
description: Upset about how marriage equality was taken away by voters in CA? Learn how to help Win Marriage Back! Join in this strategic action workshop! If you are from Los Angeles and you want to get involved you will have the opportunity to sign up for ACTION. If you are from CA and want to learn more of what is happening to change hearts and minds to be more supportive of marriage equality, come to this workshop. We will discuss the current political state, what is happening and how you can help. Anyone in CA will be able to join in the action and will be connected to Equality headquarters in your region. If you are out of state and want to know what is up or want to help please come and participate! Everyone is welcome!
print_description: Lets talk about marriage for gay and lesbian couples! How can we change the hearts and minds of thousands to be supportive? Learn how at this event.
other_location: Under the AEZ sign and shade! 6:45 & DNA

title: "Mirror, Mirror" - Body Image in Gay Men
description: "Mirror, Mirror" is a group discussion exploring issues of body image in men who sleep with men.  Though any gender/genderfuck/etc. is welcome to attend, I specifically want to create a safe, open space for men to look at how we perceive our own body types and the impact those perceptions have on our lives.  This is not a lecture or therapy group, but an open discussion where people can share their experiences, viewpoints, and feelings in a safe, non-judgmental/non-shaming space.  Vapor (the facilitator) is a San Francisco filmmaker with an educational background in psychology and communications.  His upcoming short film "Skinnyfat" deals with body image issues in gay men.
print_description: Group discussion on body image in gay men.  What do we see as personal and cultural ideals?  How do our views affect our relationships/interactions?

title: Mindfulness in Medicine
description:
Physicians and nurses who are familiar with mindfulness techniques will explore how they bring these to their work. Discussion will also include how to teach mindfulness to other health care givers. There will be a time for sitting meditation in this session.

The facilitator is a surgeon in a large medical group in Northern California and who is active in Yoga and meditation. He leads monthly mindfulness seminars with other physicians as a part of the Physician Wellbeing Committee efforts.

title: Mutant Vehicle Polaroid Booth
description: In 2008, the year Burning Man's Theme was the "American Dream," Polaroid announced their stop of large format production - the last chapter of the American made medium. Owen A Kelly thought how he might combine Polaroid with the theme of B.M. Consequently, he produced portraits identifying with the social tapestry of BRC on Type-55 Polaroid. The 4x5 in. portraits display BRC's dynamic reflection and positivity towards creative representation (My American Dream). Each participant receives the original Polaroid within moments. Owen later processes the negative in the field, combining the sensitive medium with Playa properties. With the last finite stock of Type-55 and 59, he is honoring the Mutant Vehicles with the "Evolution" of his BRC Playa Portraits Project. Expanding the studio he built in 2008, he is 'Evolving' on the 'American Dream' theme to accommodate Rolling Art. In short, Owen is participating with Burning Man Evolution by building a gigantic Polaroid Booth intended for Mutant Vehicles of both daytime and nighttime breeds, all sizes, grandeurs and riding participants. The original Polaroid goes to the operator during the portrait session, digital scans will be available to participants after the event. By Fine Art documenting this post-modern utilitarian art, He wishes to share the marvels of the 2009 Mutants with those unable to witness it themselves.
print_description: Inviting all Mutants and riding participants to be a part of the fine art portraiture documenting the 2009 BRC Rolling Art on the last 4x5 Polaroids.

description: Neuro-Emotional Technique w/David Ackerman, DC - NET identifies and clears blocks created by past traumas from our cellular memory and energy field allowing us to manifest our goals for health, career, and relationships without interference from the subconscious. Demonstrations will be performed on volunteers.

title: New Warrior Open Circle
description:
Stand in your power, speak your truth, and take charge of your life by touching your shadow, healing your wounds, and owning your gold.  Men only.
This is transformational personal growth work for men modeled on a New Warrior I-group.  It will be an opportunity to drop your mask, be real, be heard and be valued in a non-judgmental space.  What you bring is welcome here.  The circle will be open to all men, whether or not you have attended a New Warrior Training Adventure.  "Feel the fear... and do it anyway."

title: Nia Dance with Miss Bliss
description:
Grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr! Get your Nia dance ON!

Sexy, powerful, playful and fierce - Nia is the “Love Your Body Workout!” Get ready to ignite and then center your body energy. This technique is a fusion workout for the body and soul.

Nia is all about joyous movement to become healthy. Short for Neuromuscular Integrative Action, Nia´s barefoot, grounded approach maximizes body efficiency and teaches you to consciously move in a gentler way. The result is a combination of movement styles that are free and delicious.

Come to Nia at RhythmWave and you'll experience the expressiveness of dance, the power and explosiveness of martial arts, and the wisdom of the healing arts. All classes creatively encourage personalization and free expression (including sounding!). There is no holding back – "dance like no one is watching!"

During our one hour journey on the playa be prepared to experience inspiring music and pleasurable sensation as you discover "Your Body’s Way" – the movement that creates a loving relationship with the body.

Tuesday focus: Dynamic Ease – Sensing the energy and relaxation in the body.
print_description: Nia is the “Love Your Body Workout!” Dance and discover your sexy, powerful, playful self in this guided class focused on Dynamic Ease.

title: Nomadic Happy Hour
description:
The vision of Camp Nomadia is to bring together as many cool nomadic spirits as we can to share stories, resources, passion, and community. 

To foster nomadic community, we are hosting a Nomadic Happy Hour on Tuesday and Thursday (4pm to 6pm) and Sunday (3pm to 5pm). 

Come and stop by - whether you are a current nomad, future nomad, wanna-be nomad, part time nomad, domestic nomad, international nomad, technomad, lowtechnomad, former nomad, land nomad, rail nomad, backpacking nomad, open water cruising nomad, friend of a nomad, or you just want to be around nomads.

Bring some food or drink to share, and come mix and mingle. Tour a few truly mobile homes. Learn what it is like to live full-time on the road. Ask questions. Swap stories.

Or just come hang out and meet some cool folk.
print_description: Have a nomadic spirit? Wanderlust in your blood? Come mingle with other nomads - inspire and be inspired.  Past, present & future nomads welcome!

title: On Attaining Buddhahood in this Lifetime
description: What is buddhahood?  Is it just for Shakymuni? Is it just for monks removed from the day to day? Do you have to sell all your worldly possessions? Nope. The potential for buddhahood exists within everyone in their current form. All we need is the tool to call it out from within and experience a state of unshakeable happiness and compassion.  Come join us for a discussion about a buddhist practice that opens the door for anyone to attain this supreme state of life.

title: Socially Appropriate Eat With Your Mouth Open Day
description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!

title: Photopalooza at Dawn
description:
Calling all cub photographers:
Just once this week make sure you capture the golden hour at dawn. Stay up or set your alarm for 5 am and meet us at the Raygun Rocket at 5:30 sharp for a playa photo safari.

Bring your most enviable contraptions for show and tell- film, digi, ttv, pinhole, large format, toy, stereo, and OMG whatisthats!

"Press" credentials will be issued to grant you full access to all manner of not-to-be-missed photographic settings.

From the glorious sunrise, to stunning architecture, to impromptu paparazzi mobbing, to countless unique portraits, cycle the playa with your kindred photogeeky spirits.

The event will wrap up at 9 am, over drinks at a designated bar as we swap war stories and chimp each other.
print_description:
Meet @ Rocket 5:30 am w/ bike to photosafari with kindred photogeeks. 
Bring all your fab gear & catch the Golden Hour! By Obsessive-Creative.org

title: Piano tuner repair and performer
description:
If you have brought a real piano to the playa, it will need to be tuned and possibly repaired. I can come to your camp and get it into shape for you. I am also a piano player and am looking for pianos to perform on. 

In 2007, I came to the playa with my upright piano on a rolling platform and played all over the place. Unfortunately I had to be airlifted out of Burning Man due to a health emergency and had to leave my piano behind. I understand it was here last year, even though I wasn't, and that it was  possibly gifted to the DPW, who may have burned it or may have stored it and are bringing it back. It is a black upright with a sliding window on the front. If it shows up somewhere this year, I would love to come tune and repair it for whomever has taken care of it and play my heart out for you.

Contact me at Playa Magic, located at 3:00 and Adept. I will be there all week, and have piano tuning gear with me to bring to your camp.

If before the event,contact me at 713-855-9077
print_description: Available to tune and repair any real pianos on the playa.Can also perform for your camp.Contact me at Playa Magic @3:00 & Adept. PIANO MAN-BRANDY

Meet at Jazz Cafe at 10:30 am w,th,f....9am on sat and perform with us on Sunday morning!

title: Playa Choir rehearsal (AKA Playa Kwaya)
description:
If you wanna lend your voice to the gospelicious fun that shakes tents and raises spirits, come on down and SING with your on-fire choir director, Miss Madi. She wants your gospelicious voice and dusty being to get a little practice before the annual Sunday Celebration at Jazz Cafe. 

Prior musical experience is helpful, but not required. Either way you can have fun singing soulful de-rrangements of jazz/blues/gospel/pop songs, as well as improvised CircleSongs. This year we even have a BAND backing us up, so we can kick it up a notch!

============================

Hey, this rehearsal is EARLIER than all the other ones on Wed/Thurs/Fri!

Yeah, we know it sucks. But it's all there is to work with, so whatcha gonna do?
print_description: On-fire choir director Miss Madi wants your gospelicious voice and dusty being to practice for Sunday Celebration at Jazz Cafe. Get in here and SING!

title: Playa Psychopharmacology
description: Join us for an evidence based discussion on psychopharmacologic agents of interest to the BRC community. No hype or politics for or against. Just the facts. Dr Dave, a qualified anesthesiologist, will discuss actions, reactions and safety issues. All questions answered to the best of his ability. The purprose of this discussion is to educate and to promote safety. It is not to promote or encourage illegal activity in any way, shape or form. This event will occur simultaneously with the Entheogen talk being led by Ranger Sporeboy.

title: Poly People’s Court
description: Do you suspect that you or someone you love may be in violation of one or more of the Laws of Polyamory (as outlined in the Polyamory Bible, the Ethical Slut)? If so, bring the accused to Poly People’s Court to be tried in the Playa’s Highest Court of Love. The accused must be present for the trial to proceed! Plaintiffs may sign up ahead of time on the provided boards to put cases on the docket (walk in cases will also be tried if time permits). Bribes --err, payments for lawyers are encouraged for better service. If you cannot afford a lawyer, one will be provided for you--assuming that we can find one at the time. Sins -- such as "insufficient foreplay," "poor communication," and "touching without permission" shall be wrtten on the Board of Transgression and will be erased as fines are paid. Cases will be tried, and punishments assigned, by one of our esteemed judges.

title: ~ Portraits ~ Photography ~ Modeling ~
description:
~ Portraits ~ Photography ~ Modeling ~

Come share a photographic experience: learn about photography, modeling, lighting and more! 


> Portraits: take some professional-quality portraits, that will serve as a great memory from Burning Man 2009! Portraits using lighting techniques and creativity! Come dressed to impress! Costumes WELCOME!


> Photography: wanna snap some pictures, learn about photography or simply check us out? Come on down! Bring your camera (any camera will do it!) and your open mind and let's have fun!


> Modeling: love to take pictures? What better opportunity than Burning Man! We'll help you pose, give you tips and answer any questions!!


> Lighting: what is photography if not the capture of light?! Come discuss lighting, share your experience and play with the sun light!

Portraits ~ Photography ~ Modeling ~

Come share a photographic experience: learn about photography, modeling, lighting and more! Portraits for all!

title: QuadBod
description: We'll take a head-to-toe photo of you. A computer then slices that image into four segments. The computer program will then randomly reassemble one segment with three other Burners' into a surprising new whole.  This QuadBod image is projected life-size all night long with entertaining new Quadbods being created every few seconds. All races, ages, and shapes are encouraged to visit and get displayed. Also, all stages of costume, street clothes, or no clothes are welcome. Come back on Friday for a dedicated clothing optional photo shoot. No spectators. The computer will only use one segment of your whole image, so privacy is ensured.
print_description: QuadBod takes a full body photo of you and mixes it with segments of other burners. New bodies are created every few seconds and projected all night.
other_location: Somewhere between the Man and center camp

title: Quality of Touch
description:
"Quality of Touch" is something we all recognize when we feel it.Some touches are just warm and delightful, others teasing, others cold and frightening, others... just icky.  So what makes the difference, and how can YOU make sure that you know what your touch communicates? By focusing on your Quality of Touch!
 The goal of the class is to increase mindfulness with regard to consent, communication, and presence in their touch. In addition, it is intended to emphasize your responsibility to consider (or help establish) and maintain each others boundaries. Finally, it will deliver a simple set of exercises in touch and communication that can help you use Touch more effectively and consciously, as well as
emphasize the importance of mindfulness when touching each other.
print_description:
Learn when/where/what/who/why/HOW to touch with respect, consent,
presence, and intent. Enhance the way you touch and communicate. Class
fills fast

title: Raygun Rocketship Launch
description:
30 minute countdown at 9:30 PM, launch at 10 PM.

Join the intrepid crew of the Raygun Gothic Rocketship for our first post retro-fit launch. Following consultations with engineers and  
scientists from around the world, we're going to test our revolutionary new Uira engines, designed to carry us further, faster & beyonder than ever before!

Under command of test pilot Gus Gristle, we plan to make a short flight, before loading provisions and equipment for our true outbound voyage.

Listen for the Victory Siren, and you'll know it's time to get to the launch pad, and watch us re-make history!

Note: fueling operations will commence shortly after 1 PM on Friday. The rocketship will be closed due to possible explosive radiatomic hazard during the fueling process.

A 250' perimeter is required for launch. Please respect the perimeter crews - in fact, keep them company, and get the best spot on the playa to watch this historic moment!

Following the launch, stick around and celebrate the r-evolution of technology and our aspirations to explore the stars. Musical accompaniment provided by Space Cowboys and the Unimog crew.
print_description: Join our intrepid crew for our first post retro-fit launch. New engines will take us further, faster & beyonder than ever before!

title: Re:Evolution / Session 1 — God & Religion
description:
Re:Evolution Symposium - Session I
the evolution of God & Religion

Is the human capacity for divine experience genetically coded, as an evolutionary strategy to keep us focused on survival in the face of our own insignificance? Or is there really a supernatural force or intelligence that guides the universe?  how does our relationship with God and the divine change along the sliding scale between these two extremes? Does God itself adapt to changing realities of the human environment? Could there be a new evolutionary spiritual paradigm that could improve our fitness and help us side-step the impending global crisis./
TALKS: Byron Belitsos (The Urantia Book) Eli Mishulovin (Chassidic Philosophy), Mark Martinez (God & Perfoection) / DISCUSSION: Martin Ball, Byron Belitsos, Moran Cerf, Jordan Chabalowski, Mark Martinez, Eli Mishulovin

title: Re:Evolution / Session 2 — Networks & Leadership
description: Re:Evolution Symposium — Session 2: Evolution of Networks, Gender Wisdom and Organisms of Trade & Commerce. How are our expanding networks changing us as individuals and communities? What kind of wisdom will guide us forward? How do we nurture and support the positive development of the newest creatures on Earth: Businesses? / TALKS: David Fulton & Andrea Olson (Businesses as Maturing Entities), Sergio Lub (Networks of Trust), Karen Buckley (Feminine Wisdom in Sustainable Evolution) / DISCUSSION: John Perry Barlow, Karen Buckley, Moreia Buckley, David Fulton & Sergio Lub & others.

title: Rubber Chicken Social
description:
Cock-a-doodle-do! This bouncy barnyard fowl is indispensable on the playa and deserves greater recognition by our community.  Join us in celebration of the Rubber Chicken. Learn the sacred ritual of the Rubber Chicken Shot, discuss the history of legendary Rubber Chickens and dance the funky chicken. Even have your photo taken with a stretchable rubber-feathered friend.  

Rubber Chicken Camp is a New York based camp created to give artists working on playa art installations a community with which to camp. This year we are home to artists working on the installations Eighth Wonder and The Watch. Aside from discourse about Rubber Chickens we will be happy to answer any questions regarding the artwork, how it was conceived and built, and any other serious type inquiries.

Please fly the coop with us and let the bouncy begin.

title: Sacred Touch massage For Women
description: Hello beautiful sister,You are lovingly invited to be a part of a workshop called "Sacred Touch massage For Women", a gathering that honors the healing and pleasure of our divine feminine bodies.Why this is being offered? We are living in an era in which we feel shame around sharing the truth about what is happening in our bodies. So many amazing women haven't felt safe around attending playa events for fear around having to reveal their own personal std/sti status with others, or have shied away from relationships for this same reason. title: Safe/Successful Entheogenic Experiences On Playa
description:
Teonanacatl, the tool of the gods on the playa.
This lecture will focus on the Tryptamines in general, and the sacred mushrooms that produce these chemical in particular.
The need for individuals to have a good understanding of their relationship with the Tryptamines is essential, and the knowledge of these powerful and sacred tools is paramount to revealing set goals for your experiences. I will discuss dosage guidelines, as well as medical implications, diet, and set and setting. There is also a need for understanding how your state of mind, diet, and other medications can drastically change your experience, as well as the effects of “layering”, or mixing different substances.
I will also be discussing the importance of safety from both a legal standpoint, as well as a practical standpoint. Also a discussion of the on-playa resources for those who find themselves or a campmate in psychological distress. and where to go in case there is a need for professional medical and/or psychological assistance. 
Please come and learn, but remember that this information is for those who are seeking knowledge, not the substances. Please respect our gift of information by not bringing or asking us where to obtain these medicines, or ask us to identify the strange dried substance someone gave you. 
Ranger Spoerboy

Weights and measures for safe and successful Entheogenic experiences on the playa.
Teonanacatl, the tool of the gods on the playa.
Ranger Spore Boy

title: Silence on the Playa
description:
Thunderous roars and lithe laughter once again return to source.  Silence, stillness.  Turn all generators, music off, from Sunset until Temple Burn.  

Spread the word!  Like a day out of time, with all of the hustle and bustle of burning man, all of the chaos, freedom, and desire, we take this time from sunset until Temple Burn to venerate the stillness and silence from which it all comes.  A chance to turn inward, wistful, full of wonder.  An opportunity to breathe, sharing in the sub-audible with each other, the stars, and the dust beneath our feet.

This year, before the Critical Dicks March, Comfort and Joy is hosting a pre-party/support group/pride march for "select-size" burners.  If you're terrified, turned on, embarrassed, or otherwise concerned about getting naked at Burning Man 
because your bishop looks more like a pawn, you're not alone!  Come join us as we talk about the pros and cons of having a Little Jimmy (and yes, there are pro's!), look at photos of pint-sized celebrities, share techniques (gay 
& straight) for maximizing what you got, possibly drink some vodka, do a bit of "I'll show you mine if you show me yours," and, if we're feeling daring (or drunk), we'll make some posters and parade as a contingent in the Critical Dicks March, which starts at 12pm.  And as an extra incentive, the smallest cock (of those who choose to compete) wins a free bottle of vodka! 
(Everyone with a penis is invited, but if you're bigger than, say, 6" hard, we might ask you to leave.  And yes, participants WILL be asked to get naked!  If this terrifies you, this workshop is for you!)
print_description: Scared of getting naked b/c your bishop looks more like a pawn?  Come drink, talk pros & cons, share techniques (gay & str8), & march @ Critical Dicks

We will have a snow cone booth setup from noon- 1ish every day. The way it works: Come show us your best snow cone dance! Our panel of three hottie judges will melt your heart with their true jusdgement of your snow cone dance. Scoring goes from 1-5. Depending on your average score, this will determine how many delectable flavors you will recieve.
print_description: Our panel of 3 hottie judges will melt your heart with their true judgement of your snow cone dance. Come cool off and get a free cone!

title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.

title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!

title: Society: Playa Debutante Ball
description:
LA’s Hot Monthly event “Society” hits Black Rock City!! Society is for those who conform to 
nothing and desire something different. Straight, gay, Dandy boy, Vaudeville chic, drag queen, suit, model, actor or whatever, Society is an eclectic mix celebrated in the Default World and will be taking Burning Man by storm!

“Desert” High Fashion and “dusty” Dapper dress code is strongly encouraged. From Top hats to Cocktail Dresses, partygoers can visit 
www.myspace.com/societylosangeles to garner inspiration for their Black Rock City high society threads. 

Prizes will be given for Best Overall outfits! Music will be provided by San Fran and LA DJs, and delicious cocktails will be provided.

title: Speaker Series: DMT Crystals & the Fractal Evolut
description: Join Mr. Martin Ball, Ph.D., to discuss "Entheogenic Evolution," or how the mystical experiences generated by psychedelics can provide a paradigm in which we can evolve our understandings of ourselves, life, the universe, and the Divine.

title: Speaker Series: Evolution and Self-Organization
description: The tendency for many interconnected elements to spontaneously self-organize explains the origin of life and many other aspects of evolution. Together, these processes are nature's way of creating "clever" and "interesting" forms using no thought or imagination whatsoever, contrary to our human intuition. To make these processes clear, an automatically creative computer game, composerless music, and social evolution of art will be demonstrated. How does Artificial Life refute Intelligent Design?
print_description: Nature’s automatic tools for mindless creativity will b used to explain the origin of life and mind.Demonstrations of composerless music&evolving art.

title: Speaker Series: Investigating the Self
description: Our Speaker Series are community events where experts share their knowledge. Today, Nathan Evans will bring us an introduction to neuroscience! Alt title: 'Weird Science : Illusions and Manipulation of Bodily Self Consciousness'
print_description: Our Speaker Series are community events where experts share their knowledge. Today, Nathan Evans will bring us an introduction to neuroscience!

title: Speaker Series: Jumping Into Heads
description: Since time began, humans sought the elusive: how to live longer, how to make a difference, how do you think. (Or, how shall I turn on the sexy person? What else can I experience?) How are you like me, or how is it for you? Oh, to know the view from another. Make sense of or just try on. And how useful for getting things done! Imagine us all interplaying in a context of mutual understanding. No divides. Now, some neuroscience to give you all the above. This talk unravels perspective. Everyone’s basics - joining the interacting game, discovering the language code, outgrowing dependence: and a reminder that consciousness evolved from unconsciousness.  Hypnosis - why you’re constantly in it: how to do it. Immediate fluency in body language, with qualities of your experience: they shape first habits, then health. Influence it. Finally... the Barrier Dissolve.
print_description: Join Jennifer Glanville in talks that unravels perspective. Everyone’s basics - interaction, discovering the language code, outgrowing dependence..etc

title: Speaker Series: Let's Play "Participatory Evolutio
description: Learn more about the evolution of evolution by playing the game!Self-Selection (including cyborgization) has joined artificial and naturalselection in driving human evolution. You are participating already, learn therules and have fun!
print_description: Learn more about the evolution of evolution by playing the game!

title: Speaker Series: Racism, Altruism, & Why Sex is Fun
description: Starting with Darwin and the misused and misunderstood phrase "survival of the fittest," we'll discuss a basic foundation of the scientific concepts of evolution and selection, whether natural or unnatural, using some surprising animal and human examples. Then we'll dig into the underlying reasons behind some of our common human emotions and behaviors, especially the always-interesting sexual ones. How can we explain these from an evolutionary standpoint? Why are we burdened with so many traits that are now problematic for us?
print_description: Come join Hermie today for a evolutionary dissection of behavior in the Center Camp Cafe Performance Stage Speaker Series!

title: Spicey's Sunset Gathering
description:
2 celebrate 10 years on the playa, I invite you to Camp Elsewhere, 7:11 & I to enjoy a sunset together. each is different, bring treats & a seat

I have been enjoying the sunsets on the playa for a long time.  There is something special in each one.  once the sun goes down, it's a great time to throw a frisbee, do some acrobatics, and enjoy a glass of wine on the far side, where noone camps, and there's nothing between you and the mountains but space.  there is also a very cool optical illusion - the surface being a lakebed, catches the light of sunset and makes for a sparkly goodness.  I encourage you to come for a good long while and watch and see what you see.  it's one of the coolest things on the playa, and I tend to enjoy it alone.  After 10 years, it's time to share the secret.  Come on out :)  7:11 and I is where we'll gather and we'll walk out to beyond the outer ring and share some magical time together.  No art cars, please, just come with yourself, and perhaps a camp chair or blanket.
print_description: 2 celebrate 10 years on the playa, I invite you to Camp Elsewhere, 7:11 & I to enjoy a sunset together. each is different, bring treats & a seat

title: Stargazing
description: Come see the full Moon, Jupiter, the stars, the Andromeda galaxy, and the majestic disk of our home galaxy, the Milky Way! We'll have a few small telescopes and pairs of binoculars to share, and you are more than welcome to bring your own. We will be having a laser-pointer-guided star tour as well as astrophysicists on hand to answer all your burning questions about outer space, black holes, planets, comets, dark matter, dark energy, and the cosmos. Our plan is to meet at Fire of Fires (the temple), and then wander out into the playa for a better view away from the city lights. Unfortunately, we will not have any astrologers on hand to discuss your horoscope. 2009 is the international year of astronomy, celebrating 400 years of using telescopes -- join us!
print_description: Bring your telescope (or just your eyes) to the playa tonight! We'll meet, then wander out for a darker view. Astronomers on hand to answer questions.

title: Steampunk High Tea!
description: Don your finest Steamy threads and come by to enjoy a bit of civilized refinement in the desert. Tea and crumpets, ballroom dancing, costume show-and-tell and glorious conversation with the most courageous of folk. And as per tradition with Rathskellar, a game of Drunquet. For the uninitiated to this fine sport, imagine Croquet overlaid with the lack of rules from Calvinball and a severe disregard for the ease of your opponent in accomplishing anything. This is of course all done while holding a cocktail in one's hand. Make no mistake, dear adventurers.... this is the Steampunk event of Burning Man 2009 NOT to miss! Please feel free to assist us in hosting this event by providing tea and snackies to share.
print_description: Don your finest Steamy threads and come by to enjoy a bit of civilized refinement in the desert. Play Drunquet! Celebrate! Drink Tea!

You can get one new costume any time you want and as many times as you want. The only requirement is that you bring back a new person who has not gotten a costume every time you get a new costume and they need to do the same. You can keep your costume, return it or donate new costumes to share with other people. Every day at 9:30 AM volunteers clean up the boutique and put out new costumes. They get first pick of the new costumes. Don’t miss out…become a volunteer.

title: Swag Exchange Outpost
description: Could I please have a souvenir? Over the years, individuals and camps have become very creative in their souvenirs. We’ve seen some amazing stickers, patches, pins, t-shirts, scarves, cups, mugs, cast metal pendants, glass icons... For those interested in collecting images and ideas to decorate our default world and remind us to smile and remember, SwagExchange is a place for visitors to exchange stickers, patches, pins, and other event swag. We’ll have an honor-system table in Darwin’s Monkey Bar for participants to leave what they can, take what they like, and talk about all the cool stuff they’ve seen. Just like last year, Above The Limit is offering a variety of different and colorful souvenirs, so if you’re a serious collector or someone whose computer monitor or cube wall needs a reminder of something much more fun, come on by!

title: Sweat Your Prayers with DJ Lucid

An in-bodied, out of your mind 5Rhythms dance experience not to be missed.

The 5Rhythms is a simple, powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability - can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and mind that is still curious!

Sweat Your Prayers as spun by DJ Lucid.

title: Technomadic Lifestyle Workshop
description:
Seeder & Serolynne are two Gen-X professionals with strong technology backgrounds. They met via a Prius online forum in 2006 while being located across the country from each other, and joined forces to invent a lifestyle uniquely their own. For the first year, they traveled the country full time in a 16’ teardrop trailer, and now base their adventures out of their upgraded 17’ fiberglass trailer ideally suited for their technomadic lifestyle.

Their trailer is outfitted with solar panels for power and they utilize cellular data networks for their wireless broadband. This keeps their Internet-hungry laptops connected as they conduct their lives and businesses primarily online.

They travel across the country, blogging the entire way (www.technomadia.com), to attend interesting events, meet amazing people, and see incredible things. They prove that life, adventure, and rewarding work can be seamlessly merged together into an inspiring life. And they really are a living laboratory for mobile technology.

In this workshop, they’ll discuss the decision-making process to take inspiration to technomadism, selecting the right arsenal of technology, constructing your ideal mobile home, and legal issues such as domicile, voting, registration, and taxes.
print_description: Come learn how to combine technology and travel to live & work full time on the road. Embrace digital nomadism and location independent living.

title: The Tao of Photography
description:
Chuck Feil
The Tao of Photography - a new evolution in getting beyond the technical and into the creative inspirational aspects of digital photography".

Exploring the non technical side of photography. Getting photographers to understand that photography is about painting with light and composition much like the painter does with a brush. It is also about being present and capturing the moment with a click of the shutter without being wrapped up in the operation of the hardware.

Chuck Feil is a photographer, aviator and adventurer who has worked all over the United States and abroad specializing in aerial photography.

title: The Alchemist's Path
description: Artist/psychologist Sunny Strasburg will give a workshop based upon her dream workbook, "The Alchemist’s Path: Navigating and Reclaiming the Depths of Your Psyche" (Strasburg, 2007) as an entry point to discuss how each of our lives are the hero’s journey. The presentation incorporates elemental imagery that Sunny painted from a series of “Big Dreams”. These images are based in alchemy and a visual, elemental and spatial narrative. Each of us creates a “life story” in which we give meaning to our lives. The intention of the imagery and exercises in this presentation are to facilitate a beginning of reclamation- to give meaning and importance to our life stories.We will examine how during our lives, we have traveled through four alchemical regions represented by the elements, water (Solutio), Fire (Calcinatio), Air (Sublimatio) and Earth (Coagulatio). We will view these stories through the lens of Jungian, archetypal, and depth psychology. We will explore concepts in mythology, alchemy, archetypal imagery, and depth psychology and how they relate to the symbols in both our waking and dreaming lives. If time allows, we will process experiential exercises which follow the path through the four elements. Using the images from the workbook, we have an evocative starting place. The written and practical exercises are intended to help facilitate the audience’s reclamation and integration of these archetypal realms.
print_description: Artist/psychologist Sunny Strasburg will give a workshop based on her book, The Alchemist’s Path: Navigating and Reclaiming the Depths of Your Psyche.

title: *The Big Bang*
description:
13.5 Billion years ago, there was a BANG that triggered a series of events that finds ourselves at this particular moment of time. From atoms to molecules, from stars to galaxies, from DNA to life, from existence to consciousness, which leads us to NOW! 

Camp Chillax presents:
~ The Big Bang ~
an exploration of our journey through music, community, and consciousness. With a diverse lineup of amazing DJ’s, that will traverse through various genres of music, from dub, dancehall, reggae, afro-funk, house, and electro, there is sure to be something there for everyone to wet their sonic appetite. 

Photographer, Ryan Jesena, will be doing Portraits on the Playa, so bring your sexiest burner outfits and get your picture taken on the playa. Erin Storm hosting for Kalla Brousard's 'Under the Main' and Rebecca Guzman will be doing interviews on various media projects. 

So come by and hang out with your favorite Chillaxer, and celebrate this single moment that took 13.5 Billion years to create...

description: B.E.D. (Bureau of Erotic Discourse) is a grass roots organization committed to education about social communication, identifying and expressing desires and boundaries, with a special focus on sexual assault prevention. title: THE BUS STOP: BBQ
description: If the Chili didn't scare you away, we hope you come back to the Pepperland Bus Stop near 8:05ish on Hominid (west or mountain side facing the man) Thursday for our Brontosaurus- Pterodactyl B-B-Q  at 4:00 PM. Hopefully, we've been lucky enough to have not faced survival during a "Whiteout".  None the less, dust yourself off and ride in for some good food.  If you managed to make it last year, we're sure you'll be back for this years feast: just in time to ward off potential starvation.    This event is basically designed for carnivores  desiring to wet their primordial taste buds,  However, you'll probably find some sort of veggies nestled peacefully in a pot or resting on a serving plate. The evolutionary experience continues for all who dare to join in the fun.  Remember, this is a "First Come: First Served" event.  As usual, we expect this years B-B-Q'ed meats not to last for ever.  We're looking forward to meeting new friends and see old returnees at "The Bus Stop".  Remember:  "You're either on the bus or off the bus".

title: The Crystal Cavern
description: Camp Above The Limit's ultimate evening bar lounge chill space is a 40’ dome brilliantly illuminated with giant crystals that shoot up from the walls to the ceiling. The Cavern offers exotic beverages and fine hand-crafted homebrews nightly. A carpeted space with giant pillows on carpet allows guests to talk, listen to music, or just hang out and watch the colored crystals. Take off your shoes, leave the dust behind, and imagine what lies undiscovered beneath the ground.
print_description: Welcome to Above The Limit's 40' dome bar lounge! Surround yourself with giant fluorescent crystals and enjoy soft music, pillows and cool beverages.

title: The Death of Civilization
description: In the year 476 AD, on September 4, the reigning Roman Emperor, young Romulus Augustulus, squirmed in his throne as the powerful barbarian chieftain Odoacer of the Herulians, approached his throne. - The barbaric guards hired by Romulus did nothing as Odoacer seized the Emperor bodily and hurled him from his throne. -Said Odoacer: "It's good to be the king". -Odoacer was murdered and deposed by another barbarian not a year later. -Let's celebrate! - At 7:23 PM at 3:00 and Fossil, Barbarian Camp will offer rewards and recognition to the brave and strong who have attempted the complete Barbarian Challenge Obstacle Course and triumphed! - Ancient rhymes will be sung to honor the barbarian spirit that burns within us all! Our meeting will adjourn by 11 pm to make room for the Shiva Burn. -For all the works of cultured man/ Must fare and fade and fall. /I am the Dark Barbarian /That towers over all.
print_description: Barbarian Camp will offer rewards and recognition to the brave and strong who have mastered the complete Barbarian Challenge Obstacle Course.

title: The Evolution of Cultural Shift
description: A panel discussion on the evolution of activism, social change, and cultural shift featuring: Rick Doblin (MAPS), Kristin Gorenflo (MAPS), Jeromy Johnson (Pachamama Alliance), Carmen Mauk (Burners Without Borders), Eric Myers (Shouting Fire), Daniel Pinchbeck (Evolver), Amanda Rain (MPP), Robin Tala (Cyphertown), Joao Amorin (Post-Modern Times), and Neva Welton (Sustainable Bainbridge). Moderated by Charles Shaw (Huffington Post)
print_description: A panel discussion on the evolution of activism, social change, and cultural shift featuring Daniel Pinchbeck, Carmen Mauk, Rick Doblin and others.

title: The Devolution of the Drug War
description: Charles Shaw (Alternet, Huffington Post, Grist, Reality Sandwich) leads us on a fascinating, mind-blowing trip through the secret history of American drug policy, where nothing is as it appears. The drug war is one of those topics that is always met with fierce resistance for a number of reasons involving class and race and cultural identity. But more than that, it is one of those archetypal issues that is in conflict with the American mythology that we are governed by the rule of law, and the morality of righteousness. One of the great new stories we need to tell is the true history of US involvement in the global drug trade and the integral role of drugs in the American economic and political systems,  how the American government has created many of the drug problems it claims the War on Drugs is supposedly designed to address. Learn about the domestic prison crisis, and what all those drug laws are really all about. In a reprise of his M.A.P.S/Entheon Village DreamRise presentation from the 2008 Burning Man festival,  "The Secret History of the War on Drugs" is taken from his work-in-progress, Exile Nation, a book that chronicles his experiences in the drug war as both a recovering addict and activist working to raise awareness and reform drug policy, and the time he spent in prison on a non-violent drug possession charge."
print_description: Charles Shaw (Huffington Post, Reality Sandwich) leads us on a mind-blowing trip through the secret history of American drug policy.

title: The Heart of Now
description:
The essence of the Heart of Now is the practice of being present with your whole self. In The Heart of Now workshop, you’ll come to know yourself more deeply. You’ll discover the possibility of reconnection with your innate beauty, wholeness and be honest with yourself and and with others in a safe circle of love. You can discover those places you’ve felt stuck, while you are supported in letting go. You learn to become aware of those times when you get in your own way, and come to see the choices open to you. You embrace what you desire the most, and deeply commit to letting your dreams and your visions be more important than you past wounds. You will find yourself reconnecting with your innate beauty, wholeness and power in each moment.

Heart of Now workshops include numerous assistants to support you and to create a sacred space for transformation. A deeply nurturing environment is created. This teamwork approach deepens the experience of service and camaraderie, where all are able to experience their vulnerabilities, allowing trust and growth. For questions visit our website www.HeartOfNow.org.
print_description: The essence of the Heart of Now is the practice of being present with your whole self. In The Heart of Now workshop, you’ll come to know yourself.

title: The Lost Film Fest
description: LOST FILM FEST [ lostfilmfest.com ] is a world traveling cutting edge live multimedia performance hosted by VJ Scott Beibin. The program inspires discussion by exploring the historical intersections of ideology, anthropology, social movements, and current events through a cross-disciplinary lens. Topics emphasized are multiculturalism, environmentalism and green/sustainable technologies, conflict resolution, gender, economics, and the new global frontiers of participatory media.
print_description: LOST FILM FEST-The amazing world traveling cutting edge indie film showcase, performance, & discussion hosted by VJ Scott Beibin comes to Burning Man!

title: The Tree Pyramid of Life
description: The Tree Pyramid of Life is a 6 foot tall interactive meditation chamber created using four juniper tree trunks bound together at the top. Crystals are positioned to the four directions, below the meditation cushion inside the pyramid, and above the head where the ends of the tree trunks come together. The geometry of the pyramid and the placement of the crystals amplify the natural flow of your energy and the power of your intentions as you sit inside the space. Singing bowls, wind chimes, sage and juniper bring sound and smell into the experience.These sacred juniper trees died in a natural forest fire in Skull Valley, Utah years ago. Their rebirth as an art installation is a reminder of our own rebirth and transformation as we progress through life.

title: Tissue and a Plan
description: Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don't know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue. We figure that every burner could use a spare tissue, and many could have anywhere from casual to dire need of a plan. Come on by to grab your tissue and a plan. Or help us make more!

description: For the third year in a row, SPACE ELEVATOR is getting ready to lift your mind, body & soul into psytrance euphoria. We are a trance centric large-scale music camp also featuring pumping progressive trance, techno and downtempo. Our producers and DJs unite from California and around the world, bringing trippy eclectic sounds, groovy beats and hard driving rhythms to the dance floor, forming the perfect flow from dusk till dawn. We take you on daily mental expeditions and sonic journeys, launching early each evening and returning the following afternoon.Space Elevator invites you to join us as we rock the playa Wednesday through Sunday. Come dance with us as we evolve and elevate together through dust storms and double rainbows. For full details including music lineup, visit our web site.
print_description: Join us on daily sonic expeditions through trippy eclectic sounds, groovy beats and hard driving rhythms. Featuring psytrance, techno and downtempo.

title: Undecide your Life
description:
Have you ever felt 'stuck', like 'things will never change', or 'that's just how it is?' Join us in discovering some alternative perspectives that will leave you with a feeling of empowerment and excitement for the possibilities ahead! 
Especially useful for those of us in transition, challenging work and home environments, and less than ideal relationships.

title: Understand Chronic Pain & Fibromyalgia
description: "Chronic Pain: understand & discuss its many causes, consequences, and potential strategies to overcome. Open to those that deal with chronic pain."

title: Understanding Jealousy
description: No matter what type of relationship you are in or want to be in, jealousy seems to always rear its ugly head. Join me in discussing this topic along with tools to identify, understand, overcome, and work through your own jealous thoughts.

title: Unguided Meditation with Corey
description:
DROPPING ASHES ON THE BUDDHA. Kwan Um style meditation focusing on just sitting and maintaining a don't know mind. 
Coming empty-handed, going empty-handed -- that is human. Life is like a floating cloud which appears. Death is like a floating cloud which disappears. Practice non-attachment to these clouds in silent sitting and walking meditation with brief instruction for all levels of experience.
print_description: DROPPING ASHES ON THE BUDDHA. Kwan Um style meditation focusing on just sitting and maintaining a don't know mind.

title: Unified Field Theory with Jamie Janover
description: Learn about Nassim Haramein’s lifelong journey into the geometry of spacetime, which has lead to a coherent understanding of the fundamental structure of the universe and our existence in it. In this presentation, I will take you on a journey through humanity’s evolution, exposing the changes necessary to produce a Unified Physics; a unification of not only the four forces of nature, but also evolution and the occurrence of consciousness. Haramein's theory demonstrates as well a parallel between ancient codes in documents and monuments. This all-encompassing theory may prove to be one of the most important discoveries of our time.
print_description: Learn about Nassim Haramein’s journey into the geometry of spacetime, which has lead to a coherent understanding of the structure of the universe.

title: Vision & Aviation Presentation
description: Human vision, how it really works, and what it means for pilots and flying.Dr. Michael Crognale will discuss human vision in the context of the aviation environment and safety including: how our vision really works, night vision, lighting in the cockpit, external lighting, problems with vision, and strategies to optimize “seeing and being seen”.  There will also be an interactive session with the audience for discussion of questions and concepts.

title: Wild Crepes of BRC
description:
Join The French Naturalist for a walking tour of Black Rock City!
We will investigate Wild Crepes, and how natural selection has allowed for the crepes to evolve and adapt to survive the harsh BRC environment.

After the tour, we will all eat crepes together at Camp Delicioso, the Creperie, the Camp hosting the event.

TUE, WED, TH, at 10am, meet at Camp Delicioso (the Creperie.) All ages.
Please note, the TUE performance/ tour will be a full dress rehearsal.

The French Naturalist recently returned from SE Alaska, where he met up with the famed French Naturalist Naturalist.  Check out his adventures here, http://bit.ly/s9u97

Tour participants will be asked to sign a release to free the French Naturalist from any liability in case of injury.  The crepes we will be encountering are WILD, not domesticated kitchen crepes, and can be dangerous.

This release will also permit the French Naturalist to use footage from the performance/ tour to apply for grants and for use in future performances.
print_description: Join The French Naturalist as we examine how natural selection has allowed for crepes to evolve and survive the harsh BRC environs.  Then eat crepes!

title: WTS Community Stage & Pole
description: We know how plans go out here, So we're not making any on this project, And we're letting nature take its course. This one is up to you!  If we're home we will supply music. Requests will be taken, no guarantees what we'll do with them. This is not the biggest or the highest, but it is Yours! Sky is the limit: Dancing, Fashion show, hula hooping, firespinning (careful it's only wood) We're open :) P.S. FUCK YOUR COUCH
print_description: We know how plans go here, we're letting nature take its course. If home we'll supply music. Sky is the limit, dancing, fashion, hooping? We're open.

title: YOGA - Shakti Awakening for Chakra Activation
description: YOGA - Shakti Awakening for Chakra Activation with Samantha Shakti Brown and Bryn Lanfried. Live music by Jeff Mogalian / Balance is your natural state... This dynamic class is a journey into the fullness of who you are. You will be taken to new depths of embodied freedom and empowered awareness through a skillfully sequenced, fun & expansive class that employs the full spectrum of the yoga practice.

title: Yoga to Free Your Voice
description: We are all singers. Weaving our reality through the power of our creative expression. We are all gifted with voices that need to be heard. But many of us were taught to remain silent, or that our voices were not beautiful enough to share.Let's release the poet, the vibration, the harmony within you. Through a blend of Yoga Asanas and simple Shamanic exercises, we can find and free the wildness, the exuberance, the joy of song that is your natural state. We'll end with a joyful chanting session.  Open to all levels of skill and fearlessness. Bring your Yoga Mat.
print_description: Let's release the poet, the vibration, the harmony within you. Bring your Yoga Mat.

title: Yoga with RA
description:
Yoga for First Timers and Beginners*
Come experience the very basic elements of hatha yoga.  In this gentle, friendly and compassionate class you will move through breathing techniques, stretches, simple postures common to most hatha yoga classes worldwide as well as deep relaxation.
You'll feel confident trying new classes back in the default world.
*Experienced practitioners might find this class to be an enjoyable return to their roots!
print_description:
Yoga for First Timers and Beginners*
Come experience the very basic elements of hatha yoga.  In this gentle, friendly and compassionate class.

title: Youth Culture, Brand Attack, and Hip Hop Activism
description: The SHIFT Camp Lecture Series presents  Robin Tala of Cyphertown and several surprise Youth Guests who will talk about Hip Hop Culture, Brand Attack, and how the children of tomorrow are gonna save TODAY.  The evolution is upon us.Robin Tala is the Founder and Director of Cyphertown Productions, a socially conscious event production company dedicated to raising money for progressive movements and causes.  Cyphertown, well known for their presence on the Playa in providing a home for Hip Hop Enthusiasts and Artists, has raised over $10,000 for activist causes in the last 2 years including the Tibetan People's Uprising Movement, Turf Unity Project, Art in Action, among others.  Coming from a home/alternative schooling background, Robin was empowered at a young age to take charge of his life and live his dreams.  Before the age of 18 he served as the national coordinator of the Paper Campaign for Student Environmental Action Coalition, and organized with School of the Americas Watch, Mobilization for Global Justice, the World Bank Bonds Boycott and many local activist organizations in his home town of Bloomington, Indiana.  Robin currently serves on the Board of Directors of the CommuniTree Movement and continues to build cultural bridges creating powerful coalitions from previously unknown allies.
print_description: SHIFT presents Robin Tala of Cyphertown and surprise guests about Hip Hop Culture, Brand Attack, and how the children of tomorrow will save TODAY.

title: Yum Cart Taste Tasting
description:
The Yum Cart holds the power to create any taste in the world. Chili dog?
Done. Pencil eraser? Done. Northern Lights? Also done. Burners can request a flavor or be delighted by the
taste cocktails mixed up on the spot by the Yum Cart-tenders. Real food
tastes or memory tastes, place tastes and non-food tastes. Blind taste-tests,
taste-a-thons, and taste-offs. And look for us all over the playa throughout the week.
print_description: The Yum Cart can create ANY TASTE imaginable, from morning sunshine to strawberry frog. You name it, we'll make it. Come with open mouth and mind.

title: Zombie Pub Crawl
description: What if we were suddenly taken over by zombies? We'd drink with 'em! Dress like a zombie, or simply come along for the ride. A Pub Crawl round the playa with a Zaggle of Zombies! Starts at the Avant Yard and staggers to the man!
print_description: What if we were suddenly taken over by zombies? We'd drink with 'em! Dress like a zombie, or simply come along for a pub crawl across the playa!

title: Zen Chants-Compassion
description:
Chanting ceremony dedicated to Kanzeon (aka Kannon, Quan Yin, Avalokiteshvara, etc), the Bodhisattva of Compassion. Led by Koken and Kogetsu Blair Mackin, Lay Disciples of a Zen Center in Portland, Oregon.

This ceremony is based on one recited in Zen Temples, but with key parts translated into English. Ample time for questions and answers to follow.
print_description: Chanting ceremony dedicated to Kanzeon/Quan Yin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion. Led by Lay Disciples of a Soto Zen Buddhist Center.

title: Zen Chants-FUDO!
description:
Chanting ceremony dedicated to Fudo Myo-ho, the Buddhist/ Shinto deity of fierce determination. Led by Koken and Kogetsu Blair Mackin, Lay Disciples of a Zen Center in Portland, Oregon.

Fudo is a "Wisdom King", destroyer of delusion and the protector of Buddhism. He is unmoved by carnal temptations. Despite his fearsome appearance, his role is to aid all beings by showing them the teachings of the Buddha, leading them into self-control.

This ceremony is based on one recited in Zen Temples, but with key parts translated into English. Ample time for questions and answers to follow.
print_description: Chanting ceremony dedicated to Fudo Myo-ho, the Buddhist/ Shinto deity of fierce determination. Led by Lay Disciples of a Zen Center.

title: Zombie Crawl
description: That's right undead peoples. If you are looking for one more go around at drunken debauchery do join us for the third annual Black Rock City 'Zombie Crawl'. We have some Zombie paraphernalia (fake blood, pale face makeup, torn clothes, etc). However, it would be very helpful if everyone arrived in Zombie attire of their own design. We will all be meeting on Tuesday night and we'll start terrorizing the towns folk at 8:00pm so if your late you will have to seek flesh on your own.

title: Zsu Zsu's Discotheque Francais
description:
"All of you feelthy heepies don't understand French musique like ze Stereolab and Bridgette Bourdeaux.  Fuck you. You love me. -Zsu Zsu."  
Poor Zsu Zsu. So lovely, so misunderstood, so French! Now that she's a 2nd year burner, she's got something to prove to us "so-called arteests". Join us in our Dome des Amour as she spins the music and spits the insults we are simply not cool enough to appreciate.  Dancing?  "At your own risk, you deesgusting bare-nare!".
print_description: "All of you feelthy heepies don't understand French musique like ze Stereolab and Bridgette Bourdeaux.  Fuck you. You love me." -Zsu Zsu.
